hits.title: TB World
hits.description:
Discover the fascinating world of the game Toka Life, which will give you a sea of creativity and joy! Here you can bring your fantasies to life, creating stylish images for characters and cozy interiors.

The design process will be a real pleasure: choose from a variety of clothes, accessories and interior items to make each image and space unique. Transform your characters and their surroundings to create a unique atmosphere.

This game is your personal creativity workshop where you create your own story. Start your exciting journey into the world of design today and let your ideas flow, creating unique images and cozy interiors!
hits.howToPlayText:
The game opens up endless possibilities for creativity and fun, with your main task being to bring your fantasies to life and create unique stories.

The controls are intuitive and user-friendly, making it perfect for players of all ages. The simple interface allows you to easily move characters, items, and decor by swiping across the screen. You can tap on clothing and accessories to dress up your characters and drag items to decorate interiors.

In TB World, there are no strict rules or fixed storylines. You become the author of your own adventures and stories, using a wide range of scenarios, characters, and items. Your imagination is the only limit in this world of creativity and possibilities!

hits.title: Age of Tanks Warriors: TD War
hits.description:
Lead Your Tank Warriors to Glory Across Time!
Welcome to Age of Tank Warriors: TD War, the ultimate tank warriors strategy game! Travel through the ages of war, leading your tank army from Stone Age warriors to the sci-fi space future. Upgrade your battle tanks, engage in intense Clash of Tank Warriors battles, and use tower defense (TD) strategy to conquer every era. 100vs100 survival battles await‚Äîwill you rewrite history and become the greatest tank warlord?
hits.howToPlayText:
Age of Tanks Warriors is a one-click battle game, so the actual combat portion of the game is fairly simple. The difficulty lies in the strategy of how you use your army and weapons to kill off your opponents before they kill you and destroy your fortress. Once you do this, you get to upgrade your army and weapons for an even more effective strategy.

The game begins with your stone cave, which is directly opposite your opponent's cave. You can deploy your soldiers by clicking the small icon on the bottom right of your screen. The only hitch is that you may not have enough soldiers to send out in time to match your opponent's troop!

Your task on each level is to defeat the opposing army and destroy their shelter. As the levels advance, so do the fortresses, making it even more difficult throughout the ages. Fighting begins with sticks and stones but eventually turns into tanks and artillery.

hits.title: Italian Brainrot Find the Difference
hits.description:
Italian Brainrot: Find the Difference is a fast, funny, and bizarre puzzle game where absurdity meets sharp-eyed fun. Each of the 30 levels features two nearly identical images‚Äîbut with small, sneaky changes hidden in plain sight.

Designed especially for kids, this game brings together cartoon chaos and visual brain-training in a way that‚Äôs goofy, creative, and totally unforgettable. You‚Äôre not just spotting differences‚Äîyou‚Äôre diving into a wild universe full of absurd characters and hilarious scenes.

üß† How It Works
30 handcrafted levels with detailed, funny illustrations
Each level has 5 differences to find
No timers, no pressure‚Äîperfect for kids and families
Play directly in-browser on mobile or desktop
üé≠ Key Characters in the Italian Brainrot Universe
Tralalero Tralala
A three-legged shark always rocking bright Nike sneakers. Whether he's leaping through chaos or fighting with Bombardino Crocodilo, he's full of attitude and absurd energy.

Bombardino Crocodilo
A crocodile-headed creature with the body of a WWII bomber plane. He drops more confusion than bombs and makes every level feel like a fever dream.

Tung Tung
A living, walking wooden drum (inspired by Indonesian bedug) with a baseball bat. While sometimes mistaken as Italian Brainrot, he‚Äôs a crossover character who adds international flair to the madness.

Ballerina Cappuccina
A graceful dancer with a cappuccino cup for a head. She pirouettes through scenes of total nonsense, highlighting the game‚Äôs charming chaos
hits.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:
Mouse Click: Click on the difference.

üì± Mobile Controls:
Tap: Tap on the difference.

ü§™ Bonus Tips:
Some differences are sneaky‚Äîlook for color swaps, missing items, or silly changes.

No timer‚Äîplay at your own pace.

Each level gets more bizarre, so keep those eyes sharp!

hits.title: TRAFFIC JAM ESCAPE 3D
hits.description:
Clear the roads in Traffic Jam Escape 3D! Solve challenging traffic puzzles, free cars from gridlock, and master the art of strategic driving.

Get ready to play Traffic Jam Escape 3D, the addictive mobile traffic puzzle game where you control chaotic city streets and free cars from gridlock! Every second counts - one smart move can clear the road, one mistake can block it forever. Are you skilled enough to guide every car out of the jam?

In Traffic Jam Escape 3D, your goal is simple but challenging: tap cars, follow the arrows, and plan their path to freedom. Avoid collisions, dodge obstacles, and keep traffic moving smoothly. With each level, timing and strategy become even more important - one wrong move could create a crash and block the way.

Every stage offers a brand-new challenge. You‚Äôll need to think ahead, plan the order of moves, and figure out the best escape route for each vehicle. From narrow alleys to busy intersections, the puzzles get tougher and more exciting as you progress.

Featuring a wide variety of vehicles - from tiny cars to large trucks - you‚Äôll need to adapt your strategy to guide each one safely out of the mess. The more you play, the sharper your skills become as you conquer increasingly complex traffic jams.

Key Features of Traffic Jam Escape 3D:
Challenging traffic jam escape puzzles at every level
Intuitive tap-and-guide controls for all ages
Dynamic gameplay with busy intersections, narrow roads, and tricky obstacles
Dozens of levels with increasing difficulty to keep you hooked
Vibrant graphics and realistic sound effects for an immersive experience
Traffic Jam Escape isn‚Äôt just about clearing the streets‚Äîit‚Äôs about mastering the art of smart maneuvering. Dodge oncoming traffic, weave through tight spaces, and avoid obstacles at every turn. With dozens of levels to conquer, the game offers a constant challenge and endless fun.

Whether you‚Äôre solving quick car escape puzzles on the go or tackling more complex jam-packed streets at home, Traffic Jam Escape 3D delivers nonstop excitement and tests your problem-solving skills.

Ready to test your reflexes and strategic thinking? Take the driver‚Äôs seat in Traffic Jam Escape 3D today and see if you can clear the roads and guide every car to safety. Play now and experience the thrill of escaping the traffic jams!

hits.title: Chess Online Multiplayer
hits.description:
Play Chess Online and Improve Your Skills!

Are you ready to challenge your mind and enjoy the timeless game of chess? Chess Multiplayer is the perfect place to play chess online ‚Äî no registration required! Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or a seasoned player, our platform offers an exciting chess experience for everyone.

Why choose Chess for Free?

Multiple game modes: play against the computer, compete online with players from around the world, challenge a friends, or play together on the same screen!
21 difficulty levels: choose your opponent ‚Äî from Beginner to World Champion. Perfect for both newcomers and chess masters!
Time control modes: pick your preferred pace with Unlimited, Bullet, Blitz, Rapid, or Classic modes.
Interactive features: highlight possible moves, cancel a move if you make a mistake, use interactive hints to find the best move, and analyze your game after it‚Äôs over to learn from your mistakes.
Personalized experience: customize the look of the pieces and the board, set handicaps, and keep track of your rating, points, and game statistics.
Extra fun: share funny cartoon emotions with your opponent and make your game more enjoyable!
Improve your chess skills and have fun ‚Äî play Chess for free right now!
hits.howToPlayText:
Chess Online Multiplayer follows the classic rules of chess. The goal of the game is to checkmate your opponent‚Äôs king, putting it in a position where it is under threat of capture and has no legal moves to escape.

**Getting Started**

1. **Choose the game type:**
* play online against other players;
* challenge the computer;
* play together on the same screen with a friend.

2. **If you‚Äôre playing against the computer:**
* select the opponent‚Äôs difficulty level (from Beginner to World Champion);
* choose whether to use a handicap and interactive hints.

3. **If you‚Äôre playing with a friend:**
* decide on the time control mode (Unlimited, Bullet, Blitz, Rapid, Classic).
* choose your bet

**Basic Rules and Gameplay**

* Players take turns making moves.
* Pawns move forward and capture diagonally.
* Knights move in an ¬´L¬ª shape.
* Other pieces have their own unique moves.

To succeed, develop a strategy: protect your pieces, control the center of the board, and anticipate your opponent‚Äôs moves.

The game ends when one player checkmates the opponent‚Äôs king (winning the game) or when a draw is achieved under certain conditions.

**Draw Conditions**
A draw is a result where neither player wins, and the game ends in a tie. It can occur under the following circumstances:
* **stalemate:** when a player has no legal moves but is not in check;
* **three-fold repetition of the position:** when the same position occurs three times;
* **50 moves without a capture or pawn move;**
* **insufficient material to checkmate;**
* mutual agreement between players.

**Special Chess Moves**

**Castling**
Castling is a special move involving the king and a rook. It can be performed only if:
* neither the king nor the rook has moved yet;
* there are no other pieces between the king and the rook;
* the king is not in check;
* the king does not pass through or stop on squares that are under attack.

This move helps to protect the king and connect the rooks for better defense.

**En Passant (Taking on Pass)**
En passant is a special pawn capture. If your opponent moves a pawn two squares forward and lands next to your pawn, you can capture it on your next move as if it had moved only one square. Your pawn will take its place, but this capture must be done immediately.

**Additional Features**

* **Made a mistake?** Use the move undo function to reconsider your strategy.
* After each match, a detailed analysis highlights mistakes and suggests better moves.
* You can replay specific moments to strengthen your understanding of the game.
* Save your rating and choose different time modes (Bullet, Blitz, Rapid).
* Customize the board and pieces to your liking.
* Review the move history and express your emotions by communicating with your opponent using playful cartoon emojis.

hits.title: English Checkers Online Multiplayer
hits.howToPlayText:
**How to Play English Checkers**

English Checkers is a strategic board game where players aim to capture their opponent‚Äôs checkers or block them completely. Here‚Äôs how to get started and understand the basic rules:

**Game Objective**
The goal is to either capture all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers or completely block them so they can‚Äôt make any legal moves.

**Types of Checkers**
- **Simple checker:** moves diagonally forward one square and can only capture forward.
- **King:** can move diagonally both forward and backward on any free square and can capture in both directions. When a simple checker reaches the last row, it becomes a king and gains these additional abilities.

**Basic Movement and Capture Rules**
1. **Movement:**
- simple checkers move diagonally forward one square at a time;
- kings can move diagonally in any direction on any free square.

2. **Capture:**
- if your checker is next to your opponent‚Äôs checker and there‚Äôs an empty square behind it, you must jump over the opponent‚Äôs checker and land in the empty square, capturing the opponent‚Äôs piece;
- captures are mandatory ‚Äî if you have the option to capture, you must do so;
- if a capture leads to another possible capture, you must continue capturing as part of the same turn until no more captures are possible;
- when a simple checker reaches the last row during a capture, it becomes a king but cannot make further moves in the same turn.

3. **Choosing Capture Options:**
- if there are multiple capture options available, you can choose which one to make;
- the ¬´Turkish strike¬ª rule means that a checker that has been beaten but not yet removed from the board can block the path of a king or another checker.

**Winning the Game**
You win the game by:
- capturing all of your opponent‚Äôs checkers;
- blocking your opponent so that they have no legal moves left.

**Getting Started in English Checkers Online Multiplayer**
1. **Choose your game mode:** play against the computer, compete online with real players, or play with a friend on the same screen.
2. **Select your difficulty level or opponent:** if playing against the computer, choose from 10 difficulty levels; if playing online, find a real opponent.
3. **Choose your side:** select whether you want to play as black or white.
4. **Start playing:** follow the rules of movement and capture to outmanoeuvre your opponent and achieve victory.

Enjoy the game and sharpen your strategic skills with English Checkers Online Multiplayer!

hits.title: Find the Vampire
hits.description:
Looking for an exciting vampire game? This is a casual 3D game where you act as a hunter to put an end to the vampire uprising. Your task is to identify the bloodsuckers among us, destroy them and free the city from the threat.

In this game, vampires disguise themselves as ordinary people, animals and even objects. Use unique exterminator kits and detectors to expose the hidden enemies. Unlock new areas, complete various levels and defeat the Vampire Lord to save the citizens.

KEY FEATURES:
- Vampire Exterminator Kits: Get new tools to fight the bloodsuckers.
- Search Among Us: Vampires can be anyone - from neighbors to trees.
- Rescue Citizens: Free people from vampire isolation.
- New Locations: Complete levels in different areas of the city.
- Vampire Tactics: Vampires become more cunning with each level.
- Story Levels: Each location reveals a unique story.
hits.howToPlayText: The goal of the game is to identify and destroy all disguised vampires, save the citizens, defeat the Vampire Lord and stop the uprising, freeing the city from the threat.

hits.title: Blasting Marbles
hits.description: Blasting Marbles is a thrilling 2D puzzle adventure game where your objective is to strategically place the required number of marbles into the hole. Explore the game world, collecting crates to boost your marble count and discover marbles with unique abilities. Switch between marbles to split their efforts and coordinate teamwork for successful challenges. Immerse yourself in a captivating gameplay experience that combines puzzle, physics, and skill.
hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to get all the marbles in the level into the hole! The number in the top left of the screen is the amount of marbles that have to get into the hole. To make a marble move, left click near it to create a blast and watch it roll!

There will be boxes in the level - these are extra marbles you can unlock! Have your marble collide into the box to obtain them. The amount of balls in the box are displayed on the box. When you have multiple marbles, you can press the arrow keys or A or D to switch between which marble you want to have in focus.

Target weak spots in the structure (like glass or foundation blocks) to maximize collapse.
Hitting TNT (when present) triggers chain reactions to clear multiple blocks at once.
Bomb Power-Ups:
A bomb meter fills up as you shoot shapes and earn points. When full, tap the bomb icon to switch cannonballs to bombs temporarily.
You‚Äôll normally get only three bombs per level, so use them wisely on tougher structures or large clusters.

hits.description:
Pool 8 is a brain-teasing puzzle game based on a Pool board. 
Pot the balls in the correct order to move through a series of increasingly difficult challenges!

There's a multitude of difficulty levels that you naturally progress through, starting with the easiest "rookie" level. At the end of each difficulty level, you get a chance to win extra retries in the "smash the candies" bonus round. You can also earn these by watching a short video ad.
Yes, but it starts out easy. As you progress, you reach higher difficulty levels.
hits.howToPlayText:
The unique mechanics in this game mean you can only move up, down, left, and right. 
There are no diagonal movements, which poses a tricky challenge when several balls are on the table. 
The key to winning the level is to think about the order of each move to ensure you can line up all the shots successfully.

hits.title: Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House
hits.description:
Escape Strange Girl‚Äôs House is a dark point-and-click adventure available on both web and Android.

You wake up in a locked, unfamiliar house. The windows are sealed, the doors are bolted, and it doesn‚Äôt take long to realize you‚Äôre not here by choice ‚Äî you‚Äôve been kidnapped. The only way forward is to explore, uncover clues, and piece together who lives here‚Ä¶ and why they‚Äôve trapped you.

Every object can hide a secret: a sofa may conceal something beneath its cushions, a flowerpot may hold a key, or a book on the shelf may reveal disturbing truths about the strange girl who owns this place. Interacting with the environment unlocks new paths, changes the protagonist‚Äôs perception, and pushes the story into darker territory.

As in every classic point-and-click adventure, you‚Äôll collect items and use them in clever ways to solve puzzles, repair devices, and access new rooms. A simple glass of water, a sharp knife, or a roll of tape could be the difference between staying trapped forever and finding your way to freedom.

The narrative unfolds gradually, shifting from calm exploration to mounting dread. What begins as a harmless search of a living room turns into a chilling discovery of obsessions, sinister secrets, and unsettling mannequins that seem far too lifelike.

Your ultimate goal is clear: escape the house before it‚Äôs too late. But as you progress, you‚Äôll uncover more about the girl‚Äôs twisted hobbies ‚Äî and the terrifying fate that might await you if you fail.

Will you outsmart her and unlock the final door to freedom, or become just another part of her dark collection?
hits.howToPlayText: Explore the house by tapping on objects, collect useful items, combine them to solve puzzles, and uncover secrets that lead you closer to escaping.

Experience an interactive story with branching choices, a relationship system that affects the ending, and romance routes with Albert, Felix, and Victor. The atmosphere of a dark mansion, a foggy lake, and a village full of secrets keeps you intrigued. Every choice matters - will you uncover the truth or fall into the shadows of West-Alben‚Äôs sins and desires?

(lore)
(from the Showman):
Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! Welcome to the greatest show in the cosmos ‚Äî the Arena of Fusion!

Here is your instrument of chaos ‚Äî the mighty merger mallet! Don't be shy, give it a swing! 
Your mission is brilliantly simple: step onto the arena floor and prepare for a rainbow deluge! 
Smash those colorful spheres, make them crash, and when two of the same color meet ‚Äî 
BOOM! ‚Äî they fuse into a glorious explosion of points!

hits.title: Go Up
hits.description:
Welcome to Go Up, the exciting free mobile game that challenges you to protect the balloon as it rises higher and higher into the sky. Get ready to put your skills to the ultimate test with this amazing balloon game that'll keep you on your toes and your eyes glued to the screen.

Picture this. You have a tiny balloon you need to protect. You need to push away all the pointy and heavy things that get in the way of your balloon going up. But it's not that easy. The sky is full of all kinds of strange things like blocks, beams, and triangles. If your balloon even touches one of these, it's all over. Exciting, right?

But it gets even better! The higher your balloon goes, the harder the game gets. The obstacles become trickier and more difficult to avoid. You can push everything out of the way, but watch out! If you send blocks flying everywhere, you will find it difficult to protect the balloon.
hits.howToPlayText:
You have a ‚Äúshield‚Äù or barrier (often a circular protective plane) that you can move around the balloon to push objects aside.
You swipe or drag on the screen to reposition your shield around the balloon. (While the store page doesn‚Äôt explicitly describe the swipe controls, that‚Äôs the common mechanic for this kind of game.)
You must time your moves carefully pushing obstacles too late or too aggressively can send them flying in directions that block the balloon again.
The higher you get (the further in the level), the more frequent and more complex obstacles appear.

Locked in Grandma‚Äôs Basement 2: Revenge ‚Äì Horror Escape is the chilling sequel to the cult classic point-and-click horror game.
After managing to escape once, Grandma has found you again ‚Äî and this time, she‚Äôs locked you in an even darker, more twisted place.

Use your logic and courage to find tools, unlock hidden paths, and perform a disturbing ritual to escape.
Every item has a purpose, every detail tells a story ‚Äî and Grandma is always watching.
Will you manage to escape again, or will you become her next ritual offering?
Perfect for fans of horror, escape rooms, and point-and-click adventures.
hits.howToPlayText:
This is a classic point-and-click adventure with a first-person view.
You don‚Äôt move around freely ‚Äî instead, you explore each scene from a fixed perspective.

Every interaction matters, so pay attention to details and think logically to escape.

The game offers a growth journey that starts with a small piece of Metal üî© and expands into a massive factory and investment fortune üìàüìâ.
hits.howToPlayText:
Metal Production üî©:

Metals ‚Üí Money üíµ:

Factories üè≠:

Fast Investments‚ö°:

hits.title: Sorting Ball Puzzle
hits.description:
As the most relaxing and addictive color sorting game, this ball puzzle is designed to entertain and sharpen your mind at the same time. While sorting the colored balls to fill each bottle with the same color, the relaxation it brings will relieve stress and distract you from your daily worries.

This classic color sorting game is pretty simple to play, but hard to master. Just tap to take a colored ball from one bottle and stack it into another bottle, until all balls of the same color are in the same bottle. However, there are thousands of puzzles of varying difficulty. The more challenging the puzzles you play, the more careful you need to be with each move. Each move cannot be taken lightly, or you may get stuck! This Ball Sort game is definitely the best puzzle game for you to exercise your brain and train your logical thinking.
hits.howToPlayText:
Tap any bottle to pick up the top ball, then tap another bottle to move the ball into it.
You can only stack the ball into a bottle with the same color ball on top and enough space.
When balls of the same color are sorted into a single bottle, you win!
Each bottle can only be placed with 4 balls.
Use "Undo" to go back to previous steps.
Add an extra bottle if you get stuck.
You can restart the current level at any time.

hits.title: Maths Puzzle
hits.description: Maths Puzzle is a fun and engaging logic-based game that challenges your mathematical skills and problem-solving abilities. With a variety of puzzles that range in difficulty, this game is perfect for anyone looking to improve their mental agility and enjoy a fun, educational experience. Your task is to solve mathematical equations by figuring out the missing numbers, symbols, or operations in order to make both sides of the equation equal. The puzzles come with increasing complexity, so you‚Äôll need both strategy and quick thinking to succeed.
hits.howToPlayText:
Objective: Your goal is to solve the math puzzle by filling in the missing numbers or operations to make the equation correct.

Start the Game: Click on the puzzle to begin. You‚Äôll be presented with an equation that is missing some parts (numbers or operators).

Solve the Puzzle: Use your knowledge of basic arithmetic (addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division) to complete the puzzle. You may need to fill in missing numbers or choose the correct mathematical operators to balance both sides of the equation.

Hints: If you're stuck, some versions of the game offer hints that help guide you towards the solution. Use them wisely to avoid wasting moves.

Levels: As you progress, the difficulty will increase. New challenges such as more complex equations or multiple missing elements will keep you on your toes.

Time and Scoring: Depending on the version of the game, you may be timed, so solving the puzzles quickly could earn you more points or rewards.

Winning the Game: Successfully solve a series of puzzles to move to the next level. Keep going to challenge your brain and improve your math skills.

hits.title: Stack Master
hits.description:
Stack master is a minimalistic, endless stacking game where your goal is to build the tower as high as possible by perfectly aligning moving blocks.
The graphics are simple and clean, focusing on smooth gameplay without distractions.
You compete globally for the highest score (tower height) on leaderboards.
hits.howToPlayText:
When you start, a block (or ‚Äúslice‚Äù) begins sliding horizontally across the screen at some height.
You tap the screen (or tap a control) to drop the moving block onto the block beneath it.
The better the alignment with the block below, the more of the block remains. If part of the block overhangs, the overhanging part is cut off.
If you drop with a slight misalignment, the excess portion is cut away and removed, making your next block smaller.
If your misalignment is very poor (i.e. almost no overlap), you might lose the block entirely, ending the game.
Each successful drop continues the tower upward. The goal is to stack as many as possible, reaching the highest possible height (score).
As the tower gets higher, it becomes more challenging. The blocks may move faster or require more precision. (This is common in stacking games of this type.)

hits.howToPlayText:

Release your touch (or tap, depending on control scheme) to throw the ball toward the designated target.
If your throw strikes the target (a can, dish, fruit, or object), it will either fall or explode. You earn points for successful hits.

hits.title: Bow Brawls
hits.description:
Bow Brawls ‚Äì Top-Down Archery Battles!

Enter Bow Brawls, a thrilling archery survival game where you aim with drag controls that feel like a real bow. Pull, release, and strike down endless waves of enemies! Each wave ends with a powerful boss fight, forcing you to master skill and strategy.

Unlock 5 unique bows, 5 armors, and 5 arenas as you progress. Every weapon and battleground adds a new style of play. Face bosses with special abilities and prove your reflexes in intense battles.

Compete with players worldwide through global leaderboards. Show off your best scores and climb to the top to become the ultimate archer.

Perfect for casual players, kids, and competitive gamers, Bow Brawls is easy to pick up yet challenging to master. Endless action, exciting unlocks, and competitive spirit await you.

üéØ Aim true. ‚öî Defeat bosses. üëë Rule the leaderboard.
Play Bow Brawls now and test your archery skills!
hits.howToPlayText:
How to Play

In Bow Brawls, survive endless waves of enemies using skill and precision. Use the joystick (mobile) or WASD (PC) to move. Aim by pulling the on-screen joystick in the opposite direction of your target‚Äîrelease to shoot arrows like a real bow.

Enemies attack from all directions, including melee fighters and ranged shooters. Every few waves, a boss appears with unique skills like dashing, jumping over you, or launching projectiles‚Äîstay alert and adapt!

Defeat bosses to earn gems, which unlock new bows and armors with different abilities. Reach higher scores to unlock new arenas and face tougher challenges.

Your score is based on enemy kills, with each type rewarding different points. Climb the leaderboards by defeating as many enemies as possible. Manage your health bar carefully‚Äîyou only get one life per run.

Master your aim, survive waves, defeat bosses, and rise as the ultimate archer!

You move through a level or area filled with pedestrians.

After slapping, you need to escape  avoid obstacles or enemies, and don‚Äôt get caught.
As you proceed, likely the challenge is to maintain speed, evade pursuers, and possibly manage hazards or other impeding features. (The description is minimal, so some of these are inferred from how casual escape-games usually work.)

hits.title: Mike Lost In Desert - Hidden Object
hits.description:
Mike Lost in Desert ‚Äì Hidden Object

After a sudden engine failure, Mike was forced to make an emergency landing in the middle of an endless desert. His plane is destroyed, his supplies are running out, and dangerous bandits are on his trail.

Wandering under the burning sun, Mike must search for useful items, explore mysterious ruins, and survive against all odds. Each discovery brings him one step closer to salvation or to his doom.

Will he find civilization before the desert claims his life, or will the bandits reach him first?

Features:
Find hidden objects in beautifully hand-painted desert locations.
Follow a story of survival and determination.
Immerse yourself in the calm but tense atmosphere of the desert.

Can you help Mike survive the unforgiving sands and find his way back to safety?
hits.howToPlayText:
You have about 8 minutes to make your escape through five desert locations.
In each location, you must find 10 hidden objects before moving on to the next area.

If the time runs out, the bandits will catch you.
If you manage to find all the objects in all five locations before the time ends, you will escape the desert and survive.

Search carefully, stay focused, and move quickly. Your life depends on it.

hits.title: Slide Block Jam
hits.description:

Unleash your puzzle-solving skills in Slide Block Jam, the ultimate block puzzle game that will challenge your mind and keep you hooked for hours! In this captivating and strategically engaging game, your goal is simple: move colorful blocks to their matching colored doors to clear the way. However, each level introduces new obstacles and challenges, requiring you to think carefully and plan your moves to master every puzzle.

Endless Puzzles, Limitless Fun
Prepare yourself for puzzles designed to test both your logic and strategic thinking. As you progress, the levels become increasingly intricate and creative, keeping you engaged with new challenges at every turn. Whether you're sliding blocks to clear space or navigating through tough barriers, the thrill of solving each puzzle intensifies.
hits.howToPlayText:

* Slide the blocks: Move the colorful blocks to their matching colored doors.
* Solve each puzzle: Plan your moves carefully to clear the path and complete the puzzle.

* Unlock new challenges: With each level you complete, new and more difficult obstacles open up, keeping the excitement going!

Welcome to Snake Tangle, a thrilling and addictive puzzle game that will put your strategic thinking and problem-solving skills to the test!
In Tangled Snake, Your mission is to guide a mischievous snake through a tangled mess of obstacles and help it reach its tasty prey.

Snake Tangle features multiple levels of increasing difficulty. Each level presents a new maze layout, with more complex obstacles and narrower paths. As you progress, you'll face additional challenges such as moving barriers, time limits, and limited swipes, adding an extra layer of excitement and urgency to the gameplay.
Snake Tangle offers an engaging and challenging gameplay experience that will captivate puzzle enthusiasts and snake game lovers alike. So, get ready to twist, turn, and strategize your way through a tangled maze in this thrilling adventure!
hits.howToPlayText:
To successfully navigate through the tangled maze, you'll need to carefully plan each move and consider the snake's current length and positioning.
The snake can only move in a straight line until it hits an obstacle or the maze's boundary, forcing you to plan the path ahead and avoid getting trapped.

hits.title: Click Click Clicker
hits.description: Click Click Clicker defines the idle clicker genre, offering engaging gameplay where players accumulate wealth by clicking a button. As you advance, you can unlock different buttons, cursors, themes, and music. This free game is available on mobile devices and computers, providing fun for all.
hits.howToPlayText:
Click Click Clicker is as true to the clicker genre as it gets. You‚Äôre clicking a button to click another button. Click the button, upgrade your abilities, and get shiny new buttons for your hard work.

Like many clicker games, you start with one humble click. With each click, you generate cash to buy upgrades. Those upgrades include an increase in your passive ability to earn money, the amount of cash you earn per click, or the number of cursors you have.

Click Click Clicker is all about getting shiny new things with minimal effort. You can customize everything in this game: backgrounds, music, cursor, and buttons. But you have to put in the work to unlock them first! Keep clicking or coast along on your idle earnings until you get there.

Game tips
To enhance your gameplay, focus on quick movements to outwit your opponent while choosing the right timing to kick the ball. Use feints to confuse the rival dummy and create scoring opportunities. Practicing your shooting and positioning will also help you rack up those goals!


How to play
Playing Dummies World Cup is a breeze! Simply select your favorite team, then control your dummy on the pitch. On computer, navigate using the arrow keys and hit the spacebar to kick. On your phone, tap to choose and use on-screen buttons for movement and kicking actions. Stay focused and strike at the right moments to outscore your opponent!


How to play Dummies World Cup for free?
You can enjoy Dummies World Cup for free on Playhop. Just visit our platform and dive into this thrilling experience along with many other exciting online games!


Controls
On a computer, use the arrow keys to maneuver your player around the field. The spacebar is your go-to for shooting the ball into the opponent‚Äôs goal. On a mobile device, make use of the touch controls to guide your dummy and strike, ensuring you‚Äôre agile as you play against other national teams.

Drag and drop with the mouse or touch to throw your dummy in the direction of the arrow.
All you have to do is choose their favorite contending national from 32 teams (according to FIFA) and go head-to-head with the opponent team‚Äôs dummy.

hits.title: The Road Home: Granny Escape
hits.description:
The Road Home: Granny Escape is a terrifying 3D horror survival game where your only goal is to escape a haunted house filled with danger, puzzles, and fear. You're not here by accident ‚Äî Granny and Grandpa brought you here on purpose, and they won‚Äôt let you go easily.

üïØ The Story
Your trip home took a dark turn. While riding a bus through a remote forest, a massive tree crashed down onto the road. You stepped out to investigate‚Ä¶ and everything went black.

You wake up in a locked, eerie house. The windows are boarded up. The doors are sealed. And something is watching you. You soon realize the terrifying truth: you‚Äôve been kidnapped and trapped by an evil Granny and her mad husband.

This isn‚Äôt just a place ‚Äî it‚Äôs a prison designed to break you.

üéØ What You Must Do
-Explore the dark and haunted house
-Solve puzzles and unlock secret passages
-Craft useful items from the resources you find
-Avoid Granny and Grandpa ‚Äî they can hear your every move
-Survive deadly traps and unpredictable chases
-Make your way to freedom before it‚Äôs too late

‚öôÔ∏è Game Features
-A chilling 3D horror experience with immersive atmosphere
-Evil and intelligent enemies who react to sound and movement
-Multiple escape paths and secret endings
-A full crafting system: collect, combine, survive
-Puzzles, keys, locked rooms, and hidden objects
-A heavy dose of mental horror and psychological tension
-Every sound matters. Every choice counts.

‚ùóÔ∏è Not Just a Game ‚Äî A Nightmare
This isn‚Äôt just a scary house ‚Äî it‚Äôs a living nightmare. There‚Äôs evil in the walls, and death behind every corner. Will you outsmart your captors, or will fear consume you?

Use your brain, stay quiet, and find your way out‚Ä¶ if you still can.

Download The Road Home: Granny Escape ‚Äî and see if you have what it takes to survive the fear, escape the madness, and get back home.
hits.howToPlayText:
WASD ‚Äî Move

hits.title: Fruitsland: Escape from the Amusement Park
hits.description:
Welcome to Fruitsland ‚Äì a unique amusement park where fun awaits at every turn! Colorful carousels, exciting rides, and entertainers dressed as fruits ‚Äì apples, bananas, watermelons, and oranges ‚Äì fill the park. Children‚Äôs laughter fills the air, as school groups with teachers and families with kids flock to enjoy the day. Everything seems perfect, but not all is as it seems... One careless step, and you fall through an old hatch, landing in a spooky, long-abandoned part of the park hidden underground.

Before you lies a chilling, forgotten underground park where strange scientific experiments were once conducted. Only remnants of these experiments remain now, with crumbling rides and deserted game rooms that carry no joy. An eerie silence surrounds you, broken only by the sounds of old machinery and the shuffling of mysterious creatures. The first location is themed around apples ‚Äì at first, it seems harmless, but soon you realize you‚Äôre trapped. As you study the remnants of the scientists‚Äô journals, you uncover their plans to bring fruit to life, fruit that would entertain visitors around the clock. The sinister plan of the park‚Äôs owner aimed to turn fruits into real entertainers, capable of anything to amuse guests.

Your mission now is to escape from this underground horror. Every step brings new puzzles, challenging tasks, and deadly monsters that lurk around every corner, the results of failed experiments. Surviving here won‚Äôt be easy: these animated fruits have come to life, and now they‚Äôre hunting you. Every corner is a new survival test filled with horror, fear, and adrenaline. Choose your path wisely, solve puzzles to find your way out, and avoid deadly traps and monsters that only look like harmless fruits.

The first monster you will encounter is a blind apple, a nightmare resembling a zombie. It aimlessly roams the empty sections of the park, filling everyone who sees it with dread.

The second section is dedicated to the banana. This is the second colorful monster brought to life by horrifying experiments. Seeing it makes you feel as if something is invading your mind.

The third section of the underground park is dedicated to the Pomegranate ‚Äî a sinister fruit with two large eyes. These roaming eyes not only track unwelcome guests but also attack them. They emerge from their sockets and move independently, chasing their target across the area.

Can you escape from this park and see the sunlight again? Will you find a way to break free from the gloomy underground? This horror game is for those ready for survival, monster hunts, immersion in fear, and adrenaline! Complete quests, solve puzzles, defeat monsters, and find freedom while uncovering the mysteries of Fruitsland.

Download this game to dive into the fruit garden‚Ä¶ if you dare!
hits.howToPlayText:
WASD - Move
C - Crouch
Space - Jump

The main goal is to escape the park by solving puzzles. Find useful items and use them to your advantage.

hits.title: Lost Adventure
hits.description:
"Survivors of a mid-air crash find themselves in a mysterious land. The pilot, amidst crafting, mining, and solving puzzles, works tirelessly to save passengers stranded on separate islands in the wild grass. Can they conquer the challenges, reunite, and escape the enigmatic realm before the unknown dangers lurking in the wilderness engulf them all?"

Embark on a thrilling adventure after a plane crash strands you in a mysterious, wild land. As the pilot, you must gather resources from wreckage, craft tools, and navigate through the wild grass to rescue scattered passengers on small islands.

Explore ancient ruins, solve puzzles, and mine resources to unlock the secrets of this enigmatic realm. Encounter friendly and hostile creatures, and use your crafted weapons to survive. Communicate with other survivors, separated by streams and dense vegetation, through makeshift signals.

Your journey is a test of resilience and camaraderie. Each crafted item brings you closer to reuniting with your fellow survivors and discovering the way back home. Will you conquer the challenges of the wild grass and unveil the mysteries hidden within, or succumb to the unknown dangers that lurk in the shadows? The choice is yours in this gripping and immersive adventure!
hits.howToPlayText:
Become a True Survivor!
Step into the role of a skilled pilot whose plane has crash-landed on an uncharted island‚Äîone that doesn‚Äôt exist on any Earth map. In this gripping RPG survival adventure, your mission is clear: find and rescue every passenger, brave the unknown, and uncover the island‚Äôs secrets.

Scavenge for resources, battle mysterious threats, and lead your group to safety. Rebuild what‚Äôs broken, forge alliances, and piece together a way off the island. Every choice matters, and survival depends on your courage, cunning, and determination.

Can you reunite your crew, outsmart the dangers, and escape the island that time forgot?

W/‚Üë (Up Arrow): Move forward.
S/‚Üì (Down Arrow): Move backward.
A/‚Üê (Left Arrow): Move left.
D/‚Üí (Right Arrow): Move right.

Mobile Controls:
On-Screen Joystick: Move in all directions by dragging the joystick.

hits.title: Emoji Guess
hits.description: Show off your skills as an emoji interpreter in this supremely fun and frenetic puzzle game where you have to pick the right set of emojis to express the phrase, saying or movie title that‚Äôs written or illustrated above. Solve endless emoji puzzles by matching the right emojis in the right order and sharpen your logic, word association and visual perception skills with hundreds of short, colorful and often hilarious levels of brain-teasing entertainment. Emoji Guess Puzzle is a simple-in-concept but endlessly challenging and amusing puzzle game for smart players of all ages.
hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to pick the correct sequence of emojis that represent the phrase, saying, or movie title shown above the puzzle. Think of it as translating text or ideas into emoji form in the right order.
Each level presents a prompt (text-based or illustrated) and a jumble of emojis.
You select emojis in the precise order needed to match the intended phrase.
If you're correct on the first try, you earn all the stars for that level. Otherwise, you‚Äôll get additional attempts with guidance.
Stuck on a puzzle? The game offers helpful hints that can nudge you in the right direction without giving the full answer away.

hits.title: School Of Basketball
hits.description: It is the basketball arcade game in which you must try to score baskets in all the different game modes available. A basketball school opens its doors for enthusiasts like you. Do you know where to aim the ball so that you always hit the basket? Do you know any secret strategies? You have a limited number of balls and every time you miss, you also miss one ball. However, if you never miss, on the contrary, sometimes the ball will be added. How many points will you score?
hits.howToPlayText:
Touch and drug anywhere on screen to throw a ball!
You can play either arcade, time attack, and distance mode. Arcade mode gives you 10 balls to use; you must continue to score baskets although it becomes harder each time you score.
Time attack mode requires you to score as many baskets within the time limit as possible; you have unlimited balls but limited time. 
Distance mode allows you to increase the distance of your shot each time that you score. The distance decreases every time you miss a shot, don‚Äôt let the distance reach zero; otherwise, it is game over.

hits.description:
Eating Simulator The Italian Animals Brainrot A fun physics puzzle game: feed hungry animals from Italian memes by using gravity, logic, and creativity!

Is a one-of-a-kind physics puzzle game where your mission is to feed adorable and funny animals inspired by Italian memes. Each level challenges your logic, reflexes, and creativity: manipulate objects, control gravity, and build action chains to deliver food straight into the paws or beaks of quirky creatures. The game offers dozens of levels with increasing difficulty, hilarious scenarios, surprising solutions, and signature humor. Attention to detail and precision will be the key to success, while your reward will be the grateful looks of happy, well-fed animals. Dive into a world of carefree fun, where physics is your main tool for playful experiments, and every completed level brings fresh emotions. Test your skills and prove that you can feed every Brainrot animal!
hits.howToPlayText: Drag, tap, and build paths! Use blocks and physics to guide food to the animals. Watch out for traps, experiment, and find creative solutions. The goal is simple: make the creatures happy!

Start the engine, press the accelerator, and prepare to escape the chaotic and congested streets. But don't be afraid; with your quick reflexes and sharp intellect, you'll soon master the art of navigating through traffic.
hits.howToPlayText:

- Strategically select the order of vehicle movements to avoid collisions with other vehicles on the route. Carefully plan the sequence of vehicles to ensure smooth and seamless traffic flow.

hits.description:
TRAVEL THROUGH TIME & DESTROY ENEMY BASES!  Step into a thrilling time-hopping journey in this dynamic idle tower defense game! Build and evolve your ultimate tower armed with deadly weapons, powerful abilities, and epic upgrades. Battle your way through the ages ‚Äî from ancient kingdoms to futuristic warzones and magical lands. Can you stand against the relentless waves of demons, skeletons, and mythical beasts?
 BUILD & UPGRADE YOUR FORTRESS

hits.howToPlayText:
üéÆ Core Gameplay:
‚úî Kill monsters ‚Äì The more enemies you defeat, the more gold you earn.

‚úî Upgrade your tower ‚Äì Increase durability, firing speed, and damage.
‚úî Buy weapons ‚Äì Different gun types offer unique advantages.

hits.title: Durak
hits.description:
Durak is essentially a shedding card game where each player will try to get rid of the cards in their hand first. Durak is quite an enjoyable game that has over the years made a general impact on millions. It is a game that requires critical thinking, which is why it is more popular among people who consider themselves tech-savvy.

The objective of Durak is to play all your cards. The loser in Durak will be the last player with cards in their hand. So, to ensure you do not lose, try to act fast and get rid of your cards as soon as you can.

Durak is the most popular Russian card game. Durak means fool and it refers to the person who loses the game.

A Durak card game is one of the easiest and most fun card games. Players do not need much to get started. You will only need: a poker deck reduced to 36 cards from Ace to 6.

However, this game is quite interesting because there will usually be multiple winners. To ensure you do not lose, try to act fast and get rid of your cards as soon as you can.


Durak might not be a game you are overly familiar with. But in Russia, Durak is by far the most popular card game! It has got a fascinating history and will be sure to make a unique choice if you are looking for something a little different.

Another interesting thing about this game is that it is played with a smaller deck.

Durak is fun and, rather, a unique card game. If you enjoy more strategic card games and are looking for something a little different, why not give Durak a try?
hits.howToPlayText:
Durak is played by 2 to 4 players. Total cards used are 36 cards - Only 6 7 8 9 10 J Q K A of all suits are used.

The deck is shuffled, and each player is dealt with 6 cards. The bottom card of the stock is turned and placed face up on the table. The rest of the pack is then placed on half over the turn-up and at right angles to it, so that it remains visible. The trump suit is drawn as the last card.

The first person to play is the one who holds the lowest trump suit in his hand. The game proceeds in a clockwise direction. The player who started to play acts as an attacker and the player sitting next to him in a clockwise direction acts as a defender.

The player who has the lowest trump card will be the first attacker. If the attack succeeds, the defender loses their turn, and the attack passes to the player on the defender's left. If the attack fails, the defender becomes the next attacker. The attacker opens their turn by playing a card face up on the table as an attacking card. Defender responds to the attack with a defending card. A trump card of any rank beats all cards in the other three suits

To win Durak, you need to play all your cards quickly. Once you have played your cards, you are out of the game and will need to wait for the rest of the players. The last player with cards in their hand loses.

hits.title: Master Checkers
hits.description: Play Checkers, the classic two-player board game! Make diagonal moves, eliminate opponents, and crown your piece as a king. Challenge the computer, a local player, or opponents worldwide in this exciting Italian Checkers version!
hits.howToPlayText:
Moves are only allowed on dark squares, so pieces always move diagonally. Single pieces are always restricted to moving forward (towards the opponent).
Capture pieces by jumping.
A piece that makes a capture (jump) jumps over one of the opponent's pieces and lands in a straight diagonal line on the other side. Only one piece can be captured in one jump; however, multiple jumps are allowed in one move.
Jumps (or captures) are mandatory.
If a player can make a capture, the jump must be made.

When a piece reaches the furthest row from the player who controls it, it becomes a king and can move either forward or backward.

Mega Jump isn't just another jumping game; as one of the best free jumping games available, it tests your focus, flow, and flair in ways other games can't match.

Want to float like a balloon? Done. Need to snag every coin in sight? The Coin Magnet has your back. Feeling fiery? Grab a Super Nova boost and rocket through the levels like a comet. Watch out for sneaky monsters, tricky traps, and gravity trying to pull you back down.

With stunning cartoon visuals, gorgeous backdrops, and challenges that keep you guessing, Mega Jump delivers nonstop fun. Unlock quirky characters‚Äîfrom daring heroes to adorable critters‚Äîand make them your jumping champions.

Whether you're chasing coins or blasting into space, this jumping game turns every leap into an adventure, proving why it's ranked among the best free jumping games you can play.

Play Mega Jump Online Today
If you're looking for more heart-pounding challenges and unforgettable adventures, check out Arkadium's collection of free online games that can be played instantly without installs or downloads. Experience the thrill of racing games that put you in the driver's seat or addicting games packed with nonstop action. Enjoy!

Your goal is simple: Jump high, grab coins, and soar to new stages. Miss a grab, and it's Game Over‚Äîstay sharp and quickly make your next move. Keep aiming for the highest score. Use the arrow keys to move left or right to jump on the platforms.


Mega Jump Game Tips:
Gold Coins: Snag 100 for a boost.
x2 & x5 Coins: Blue and red-centered coins are worth double and quintuple‚Äîcha-ching.
Trickster Coins: Watch out; these sneaky coins run away when you get close.

Boost Stars
Shiny stars launch you higher. Yellow, green, blue, and red‚Äîeach more potent than the last. Collect as many as possible to gain massive boosts and fly to new heights.

Save Stars
Falling? Tap your Save Star to rocket back up. You start with 5, so use them wisely and don't waste them.

Power-ups to the Rescue
Umbrella: Float down gently and magnetize coins.
Jump Boots: Bigger, faster, higher jumps.
Magnet: Pull in coins like a boss.
Lucky Blast: Transform everything into coins and stars.

Avoid These Dangers
Anvil: Stops you cold. Dodge it.
Ball & Chain: Slows you down‚Äîugh.

Bounce on blocks, outsmart enemies, and blast past obstacles. Ready to jump into the fun? Let's go.

hits.description:
Number Click Merge is a simple yet highly addictive number puzzle game that challenges your logic and observation skills.

Tap on groups of the same number to merge them into a higher number! The more blocks you merge in one move, the more points you earn. As numbers grow, the board becomes more strategic ‚Äî plan carefully to keep the combos going!
hits.howToPlayText:
Tap on two or more connected tiles with the same number.

They merge into one tile with a higher number.

New tiles fall from the top to fill the gaps.

Keep merging to reach higher numbers and beat your high score!

hits.title: Chroma Trek
hits.description: Immerse yourself in Chroma Trek, a breathtaking neon platformer that dazzles with vibrant visuals and innovative gameplay. Each level is a unique masterpiece, offering diverse challenges that keep you engaged and on your toes. The core mechanic of color-switching lets you seamlessly pass through various types of obstacles, adding depth and excitement to every moment. As you navigate through dynamic environments, you'll be uplifted by motivational messages from the creator, encouraging you to push forward and conquer the journey to the Finish Crystal!
hits.howToPlayText:
Objective: Navigate through a series of challenging obstacles to reach the Finish Crystal and complete the level!

Controls: Move your character using one of two control schemes:
A or ‚Üê: Move Left
D or ‚Üí: Move Right
W or Spacebar: Jump

Gameplay:
Dodge Obstacles: Avoid traps, pits, and other hazards.
Reach the Crystal: Find and touch the Finish Crystal to win the level.

hits.title: Queens Royal: Sudoku Puzzle
hits.description:
Rule the Grid with Royal Precision!

Queens Royal reimagines the classic eight queens logic puzzle into a modern masterpiece, where elegance meets relentless brain-teasing challenges. Place your queens wisely, strategize every move, and conquer 5,000+ levels of mind-bending puzzles designed to test your intellect and crown you the ultimate ruler of logic!

Why Queen Royal Will Captivate You
- Brain-Training Excellence: Sharpen logic, strategy, and problem-solving skills with puzzles that evolve in complexity.
- Sleek & Serene Design: Minimalistic visuals and soothing colors keep your focus on the challenge, not clutter.
- Daily Reign Challenges: Fresh puzzles and timed events with endless variety.

Features Fit for a Monarch
- 5,000+ Levels: From gentle warm-ups to expert-tier enigmas, every puzzle is a new conquest.
- Smart Hints: Stuck? Use hints to nudge your strategy without spoiling the thrill.
- Endless Mode: Infinite levels mode lets you relax and strategize stress-free.
- Elegant Tutorials: Learn the rules in seconds‚Äîmastery takes a lifetime.

A Puzzle Game That Earns Your Crown
Easy to learn, impossible to put down. Queen Royal is the perfect blend of simplicity and obsession. Whether you‚Äôre a chess pro, a sudoku savant, or a casual gamer seeking a mental spark, Queen Royal offers a regal challenge that grows with you. Outthink the grid, outmaneuver the rules, and reign supreme in a world where every victory feels legendary.
hits.howToPlayText:
Rule the Grid with Royal Precision! In this elegant brain-teaser, your logic and strategy will be tested as you place your queens to conquer the board. With thousands of mind-bending puzzles, each move counts on your path to becoming the ultimate ruler of logic!

Game Objective:
 - The goal is to place one queen in every row, column, and color-designated zone on the grid.

Rules:
 - One Queen Per Realm: You must place exactly one queen in each row, column, and color zone.
 - No Touching Crowns: Queens cannot be placed in squares that touch each other, including diagonally.
 - Unique Solution: Every level is designed to have only one correct solution, so no guessing is required!

hits.title: Cargo Path Puzzle
hits.description:
Cargo Path Puzzle is a free puzzle-platformer that puts your logic and movement skills to the test. Navigate tricky levels filled with deadly voids, collapsing blocks, trampolines, ice slides, and directional blocks.
Your goal: collect all the keys to activate the exit portal‚Äîthen reach it to win.
Each level has only one correct solution, so plan your moves carefully. One wrong step can trap you or block your progress.
If you enjoy clever puzzles, single-solution challenges, and smart platforming, Cargo Path Puzzle is made for you.
hits.howToPlayText:
Move: Use the arrow keys or WASD to move up, down, left, and right.
Jump: Press Spacebar to jump in the last direction moved, skipping over one tile.
Goal: Collect all keys to unlock the portal and step on it to finish the level.

hits.title: Bullet Echo
hits.description:
Lead your team to victory in this unique PvP tactical team shooter! Choose from dozens of different heroes with unique play styles and abilities. Unite with friends, set a strategy, and be the last team standing when the battle ends. Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. Unlock and upgrade new heroes, participate in championships, and fight to unlock new perks, maps, and game modes!

Bullet Echo ‚Äî Game Description
Bullet Echo is a tactical, team-based PvP shooter with a unique top-down perspective, developed by ZeptoLab. The game stands out for its stealth-focused gameplay, fast-paced battles, and emphasis on teamwork.

Key Features
Unique Tactical Stealth Action:
Your vision is limited by the beam of a flashlight, but you can hear enemies' steps and shots. This creates suspenseful, strategic encounters where sound and positioning are crucial.

Team Play and Strategy:
Play with friends or match with players worldwide. Unite your team, set a strategy, and be the last team standing. The level of your hero is matched with the highest in your party, making it easy to play with friends of any experience.

Diverse Heroes:
Choose from dozens of different heroes, each with unique play styles, weapons, and abilities. Unlock and upgrade heroes to boost their power and unlock new perks.

Multiple Game Modes:

Battle Royale: Five teams of three players each compete to be the last team standing on a shrinking map.

Team vs Team: Two teams of five players face off on exclusive maps.

King of the Hill: Solo mode with 15 players battling for survival.

Additional modes and maps are available as you progress.

Progression and Rewards:
Participate in championships, accomplish missions, and receive valuable resources. Unlock new heroes, perks, maps, and game modes as you play.

Gameplay Overview
Top-Down Shooter:
The game uses a top-down view, giving players an aerial perspective of the battlefield. Stealth, quick reflexes, and tactical movement are essential.

Auto-Shooting:
Heroes automatically fire when an enemy enters their firing cone, allowing players to focus on movement and positioning.

Looting:
Collect weapons, ammo, armor, and power-ups during matches to enhance your hero‚Äôs abilities.

Revive System:
Teammates can revive each other during battles, adding another layer of teamwork and strategy.
hits.howToPlayText:
Main Objectives
Team up with friends or play solo to compete in tactical PvP battles.

Survive and eliminate enemy teams using stealth, strategy, and your hero‚Äôs unique abilities.

Collect loot and power-ups to strengthen your hero during each match.

Be the last team or player standing to win the round.

Desktop Controls (if playing via emulator or official desktop version)
Note: Bullet Echo is primarily a mobile game, but can be played on PC via Android emulators. Controls may vary depending on emulator settings.

W, A, S, D / Arrow Keys: Move your hero.

Mouse: Aim your flashlight cone (direction of vision).

Left Mouse Button: Use hero‚Äôs special ability (if mapped).

Spacebar: Interact with objects or revive teammates (if mapped).

Esc: Open game menu or pause.

You can customize key bindings in most emulators for optimal comfort.

Mobile Controls
Virtual Joystick (Left side): Move your hero around the map.

Swipe / Drag (Right side): Aim your flashlight and field of vision.

Ability Button: Tap to activate your hero‚Äôs special ability.

Interact Button: Tap to pick up items, open chests, or revive teammates.

Auto-Shoot: Your hero fires automatically when an enemy enters your cone of vision.

Tips for Success
Use walls and obstacles for cover and to ambush enemies.

Listen for enemy footsteps and gunfire to locate opponents in the fog of war.

Stick with your team for better chances of survival and to revive each other.

Upgrade and experiment with different heroes to find your best play style.

Master the controls and tactics to dominate the arena in Bullet Echo!

hits.title: Parking Boom
hits.description:
Parking Boom is a fun and addictive physics-based game where your goal is to launch your car straight into the parking spot!
Adjust the power and angle, smash through other vehicles along the way, and try to land as accurately as possible.

Each level offers unique obstacles and creative challenges that make your ride exciting and unpredictable.
Sharpen your parking skills, beat level after level, and aim for perfection in this fast-paced and explosive adventure.

With a variety of cars, dynamic stages, and tons of destruction, Parking Boom turns every parking attempt into a chaotic thrill ride!
If you're looking for something fresh, loud, and action-packed, Parking Boom will drive you into a world where crashing is half the fun!
hits.howToPlayText:
Aim Your Car
Adjust the angle, direction and power using the mouse or touching the screen.

Launch and Crash
Release to launch your car. Smash through other vehicles as you fly toward the parking spot.

Park Accurately
Try to land your car inside the highlighted parking zone.

hits.description: A logic puzzle game inspired by Nurikabe and Islands of Insight. Create islands with exact numbers while keeping walls connected. On mobile:

Double-tap to fill areas.

hits.description:
Ready to challenge your brain and reflexes like never before?

In this fast-paced action game, you'll control a car and a spaceship simultaneously. While dodging enemies and obstacles with one vehicle, you‚Äôll be collecting coins and power-ups with the other ‚Äì all in real time!

Face random events and power-ups that shake up the gameplay

Climb the global leaderboard and prove your skills

This game is designed to test your concentration, dexterity, and multitasking to the absolute limit. Whether you're dodging missiles or grabbing that last coin, every second counts.

Can you handle the chaos?

hits.title: Drone Dash - Time Challenges!
hits.description:
**How to Play**

Welcome to **Drone Dash - Time Challenges** ‚Äì a fast-paced arcade puzzler where quick thinking and precision bouncing are the keys to victory! You‚Äôll control a zippy little drone that *dashes* between walls and platforms like a high-tech pinball. But this isn‚Äôt your typical platformer ‚Äì no jumping, no gravity drops. Your drone glides and ricochets from surface to surface, smoothly darting through tight spaces full of traps and twists.

Your mission? **Collect as many bullets as you can before time runs out!** The more you grab, the more stars you‚Äôll earn (up to 3 per level). Once you collect the minimum required, a glowing crystal spawns back at your starting point ‚Äì reach it to complete the level. But watch out! Hit a trap or run out of time, and it's back to the start.

Levels are short, intense, and packed with surprises. New traps and tricky tiles will keep you on your toes as you dash your way to perfection. Fast reflexes and smart movement make all the difference!

**Controls:**
üñ±Ô∏è On PC: Just click to bounce your drone in the direction of your choice!
üì± On Mobile: Just tap to bounce your drone in the direction of your choice!

Ready to test your reflexes and grab those stars? Dive into the dash and beat the clock!

hits.title: 4 Color Card Game
hits.description: 4 Color Card Game is a fast-paced, easy-to-learn card game perfect for players of all ages. The goal is simple: match cards by color or number and be the first to get rid of all your cards. With action cards that can change the flow of the game in an instant, every round is full of surprises and fun. Whether you're playing with friends, family, or challenging opponents online, 4 Color Card Game delivers quick, exciting matches that keep you coming back for more.
hits.howToPlayText: To play 4 color card game on a desktop, use your mouse to interact with the cards. Your hand appears at the bottom of the screen. For Wild cards, click to play, then select a color by clicking the desired color option. When you have one card left, click the ‚ÄúTAP‚Äù button to avoid penalties. The game automatically ends your turn after each action.

¬´Archery Master - Castle Battle¬ª is an exciting archery game! Grab your bow and arrows and prepare for battle!

Conquering all the kingdoms won‚Äôt be easy. You‚Äôll face orcs, humans, monsters, and the undead! Upgrade your archers, recruit mercenaries, use different types of arrows, apply poisons, and victory will be yours!

- Simple and intuitive controls  
- A variety of arrows and poisons to use

- Dozens of challenging levels  
- Upgradable archer bastion
     

Controls:    
- Tap to fire arrows

hits.title: 2048 3D: Merge Cubes
hits.description:
Merge the Blocks, Reach 2048, and Conquer the Levels!**

Blocks with numbers from 2 to 2048 drop onto the field. Combine matching blocks to create higher-value ones and score points. But watch out ‚Äî some blocks are stones, which can‚Äôt be merged. Use powerful boosters like bombs and lightning to clear them out.
1. Make the most of your boosters:
2. X2 ‚Äî doubles the value of any number block
3. Bomb ‚Äî destroys surrounding blocks

Flash ‚Äî removes all stones from the field

Don‚Äôt let the blocks stack above the top boundary for more than three seconds ‚Äî or it‚Äôs game over!

Complete challenging levels, set high scores in endless mode, and become the ultimate merge master!
hits.howToPlayText: Swipe left or right on an empty area of the screen (or drag with the left mouse button held down) to move the block into position. Release your finger (or let go of the mouse button) to drop the block.

hits.description:
You need to turn over the cards, trying to find pairs of identical ones.

If two different cards are turned over, they are automatically turned back over, giving the player a little time to memorize them.

The level will be completed when the player opens all pairs of cards in the playing field.

There are two additional game modes in which you can set records by competing with other players: for time and for the minimum number of moves.
hits.howToPlayText:
Click on any inverted card with the mouse or your finger on the touchscreen to open it.

When a player has unfolded two cards, the player is credited with opening one pair of cards if they turn out to be the same. And if the cards turn out to be different, then they will turn back over.

After that, you can open the following cards.

hits.title: Even Odd Dice
hits.description: Play Even Odd Dice ‚Äì a thrilling online game for 1-4 players! Easy rules, fun gambling twist. Great for families, friends, or solo play. Test your luck and prediction skills now in this exciting dice game!
hits.howToPlayText:
Each player chooses whether their bet is ‚Äúeven‚Äù or ‚Äúodd‚Äù. After that, you need to press the dice and see what luck will be like! There is also a special mode where you can try to get the maximum number of wins in a row - just one-on-one with fate. Good luck in the game!


The game of Even-Odd on Dice is an exciting pastime for 1-4 players that combines simplicity of rules with gambling elements. Perfect for family evenings, friendly gatherings or even a solitary game.

The object of the game is to predict whether the sum of the dice will be the exact number of even or odd numbers. Each turn brings an element of chance and strategy, as players must take into account previous rolls and try to guess when luck will be on their side.

Game includes:

Easy rules: Suitable for players of all ages, allowing you to learn the mechanics quickly.

Instant Results: Each roll of the dice creates tension and anticipation, making gameplay exciting.

Flexible Format: You can enjoy the game either in company or alone, taking on the challenge on your own or competing with friends.

Join the exciting world of Odd-Even and see who will be the master of prediction!

Inflate balloons, dodge obstacles, and climb as high as you can! The bigger your balloon, the more coins you earn - but watch out for spikes!

How big can you grow your balloon?

hits.title: Cards in Fool
hits.description: Play Cards in Fool ‚Äì a strategic turn-based online card game! Outsmart opponents, make them draw cards, and climb the leaderboard. Flip cards, win matches, and earn points in this classic multiplayer challenge!
hits.howToPlayText: In the game of "Cards a Fool", the classic rules are that the one with the smaller trump card goes first. There are 36 cards in the deck. At the beginning, one trump card is selected, which determines the highest suit over all. The principle of the game is the same, First one goes with any card, the other must fight off with the highest of the same suit or a trump card. If the one who strayed then he walks and so on in turn. The winner is the one who has no cards left and the deck is empty. In the case when no one has any cards left, a draw is recognized, in this case no points are awarded or taken away. Track your score on the leaderboard.

hits.title: Furry Kung Fu
hits.description:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from.
hits.howToPlayText:
Furry Kung Fu is a fun fighting game with cute cartoon graphics. You play as Catsei or his student Kung Fu Cat. You need to hit the opponent with a lot of punches, while dodging all kinds of objects flying at you, such as balls, comets, fire and pots. It's so much fun!

Engage in an epic Kung Fu battle with your opponent. Get coins, unlock player skins and new weapons!

Bright and memorable characters will keep you entertained, and simple game controls allow you to focus on battling countless hordes of pigeons, rats, aliens, crocodiles, and other animals. Can you collect weapons in battle and unlock all available maps? Two playable characters to choose from
–ö–∞–∫ –∏–≥—Ä–∞—Ç—å
Control on the PC: by arrow buttons, on the smartphone - by swipes and taps on the screen.

Swipe: left/right arrow, tap on the screen to the left/right of the player.
Combo: repeatedly pressing the button in the direction where you want to apply a combo / multiple tap to the left or right of the player.
Sit down: down arrow / swipe down.
Jump: arrow up / swipe up.
Double jump (if available for a specific skin): double arrow up / two swipe up

Uppercut - squat and jump, arrow down and up / swipe down and up;
Attack from above - press the down arrow / swipe down while jumping.

The enemies drop weapons and lives. You can pick them up by tapping/tapping in their direction.

The enemy on the ball and comet can be shot down. The rat in the window can be turned off briefly by throwing a weapon at it.
Levels in the Survival game mode are unlocked as you progress through the main Campaign.

Tile Match Puzzle fulfills your desire for puzzle fun with new puzzle challenges every day! Simply match three tiles to reveal even more tiles underneath. Find more combinations until you've cleared everything. But beware: If you select too many tiles without at least three matching each other, you will have to start your journey from the beginning.

Each level presents you with a new addictive puzzle challenge. Take a fun and relaxing getaway as you enter beautiful new landscapes to test your brain. 

Game features
 
Unique Tile Puzzles:
With tiles in over 20 styles, there's no limit to the number of combinations you can make. 

Flex your brain muscles
Test and improve your memory and pattern recognition skills with this fun and relaxing puzzle game!
hits.howToPlayText:
How to play Tile Match Puzzles
- Tap to place the tiles into the box. Match 3 or more of the same tiles to remove them from the puzzle board.
- Remove all tiles from the board to win the level.
- Beat each level as best as possible to win coins and collect them all!
- Complete each level to progress through your journey. Hundreds of challenging and colorful tile matching puzzles await!

hits.title: Card Quest: 10 Minute Adventure
hits.description: Dudes, this is a very short strategic card battle game that blends tactical gameplay with quirky humor and vibrant creativity. Build powerful armies, summon creatures, cast spells, and construct buildings across unique terrains in epic turn-based battles. What sets this game apart is its dynamic terrain system‚Äîeach battlefield zone corresponds to specific card types, favoring attackers, healers, defenders, or versatile "special units" that can be placed anywhere! With customizable decks and deep strategic options, players must outwit their opponents to claim victory. Unlock new cards, upgrade your favorites heroes, and dominate the battlefield in this thrilling clash of wits and strategy. Let's go. In and out. After all, this is Card Quest: 10 Minute Adventure!
hits.howToPlayText:
‚Ä¢ Deck Building: Before starting a match, create your deck using cards you‚Äôve collected. Customize your deck based on strategy‚Äîfocus on attack-heavy units, healing abilities, or powerful spells. 
‚Ä¢ Terrain Zones: At the start of the game, choose which terrains to place on your side of the board. Each terrain type allows only certain creatures to be summoned there, except Rainbow Creatures, which are flexible. Terrain types:
- Cornfields: Strong attackers.
- Sandlands: Defensive powerhouses.
- Blue Plains: Balanced but unpredictable.
- Candy Kingdom: Weak but great at healing allies.
- Useless Swamp: Special ability users or direct-damage dealers.
‚Ä¢ Turn-Based Mechanics: On your turn, draw cards, spend resources (Magic Points), and deploy creatures, buildings, or spells onto the field. Attack enemy creatures or target their towers directly when possible. 
‚Ä¢ Winning Conditions: Outlast your opponent by maintaining stronger forces, controlling key areas, and dealing consistent damage.

hits.title: Craftsman Land
hits.description:
Craftsman Land ‚Äì build your own farm and help the town recover!

Craftsman Land is a farming and crafting game where your goal is to rebuild the inherited land, expand your farm, and support the local community.

After a devastating flood, the town is in ruins. As the heir to the land, it‚Äôs up to you to restore your farm, help the townsfolk, and bring life back to the surrounding villages. Grow crops like corn and onions, go fishing, and construct new buildings such as a house, chicken coop, and cowshed. Inside your home, you can decorate and design the interior to your liking.

Take care of your animals ‚Äì feed chickens and cows, collect fresh eggs and milk, and use them for crafting or trading. Complete quests for local people, trade with merchants, and produce a wide variety of items thanks to the crafting system. Improve your skills, specialize in your favorite activities, and become a true master craftsman.

The world of Craftsman Land is constantly growing with new places, tasks, and adventures waiting to be discovered
hits.howToPlayText:
In Craftsman Land, playing is simple and intuitive. On mobile devices you tap the screen, while on PC you use the mouse. Actions are performed automatically ‚Äì all you need are the required items and resources. With just a click, you can trigger different activities such as building houses, crafting tools, or producing goods.

Complete quests given by townsfolk to earn rewards and progress in the story. When you run out of quests, head to the crossroads where the bulletin board offers an endless supply of new tasks.

Explore the map to visit different shops:

Building materials store ‚Äì get everything you need for construction.

Tool shop ‚Äì find useful equipment for your farm.

Gardening store ‚Äì buy seeds and expand your fields.

Not everything has to be bought! Many materials can be produced by yourself. Chop wood, fire clay into bricks at the campfire, and create other essential resources to use in crafting and construction.

Grow crops, raise animals, trade, and craft your way to success while helping the entire town thrive!

Master the art of hooking in this addictive puzzle game! Solve intricate puzzles by untie the hooks to accumulate wealth

Levels: Each level presents a unique puzzle. Completing levels earns you in-game currency and unlocks new challenges.
Challenges: Some levels come with special challenges that offer additional rewards upon completion.
Lives System: Players have a limited number of lives. Losing all lives may require waiting or watching ads to continue.

The main character finds himself in the epicenter of the tragedy by accident: being away from the city, he learns about the beginning of the apocalypse just two weeks after it began.

Now he has to not only fight for survival in a new, cruel world, but also reveal its secrets. Collecting information bit by bit, he tries to understand the nature of the disaster and its impact on people..
