hits.title: Dice Puzzle
hits.description: Dice Puzzle is a puzzle game where your task is to strategically place numbered cubes on the board, aiming to merge three adjacent cubes with the same number. As they combine, their value increases. Carefully select cubes with different points, considering their placement to match with others effectively. Be mindful, as cubes may appear individually or in pairs. Merge three or more dice horizontally or vertically to create higher-valued cubes. Utilize the storage space wisely to save cubes for later use. Test your puzzle-solving skills in this engaging dice-merging game!
hits.howToPlayText:
Select a die (or a pair) from your tray and drag it onto the grid where it fits.
Tap the dice in the tray to rotate them before placing, especially helpful for pairs
When three or more dice of the same face touch, whether horizontally or vertically (even diagonally adjacently), they automatically merge into one higher-value die

hits.title: Slow Time Ninja
hits.description: Master time and precision in this stealth ninja game! Swipe to throw your weapon, freeze time to plan, and strike with deadly accuracy. Outsmart enemies, use your surroundings, and defeat all foes with true ninja elegance.
hits.howToPlayText:
Swipe to throw your weapon at enemies, showcasing incredible ninja mastery.  While the weapon is in your possession, time moves slowly, giving you the chance to carefully plan each move. But as soon as you throw the weapon, time returns to its normal speed. Therefore, every action you take must be deliberate and precise to find the perfect moment for an attack. 

The mission will end when all enemies on the battlefield are defeated.  However, don‚Äôt forget to stay aware of your surroundings‚Äîsome opponents may be faster, stronger, or craftier than they initially appear. 

Stay stealthy, use the environment, and take advantage of the time-slowing mechanic to secure victory.  Your task is not just to attack, but to do so with cold calculation and the elegance of a true master.

hits.title: Stickman Miners Wars
hits.description: Lead your stickman king to victory in Stickman Miners Wars, where strategic decision-making is key. Command an army of miners and warriors to build your forces and triumph over opponents. Upgrade your units and yourself as you gain experience, and strategically attack enemy castles while defending your own. Will your strategy lead you to dominance? Play Stickman Miners Wars now!
hits.howToPlayText:
First, you need to choose the first region you want to reclaim on the global map and press the PLAY button.

After this, you will enter the level and can play as the Stickman King. To move, use the keyboard keys (arrow keys or WASD) or a joystick or mouse.

To start, go to the miner purchase zone and buy a few miners. They will begin mining gold for you, and you can mine gold alongside them. Once you have accumulated enough gold, go to the warrior purchase zone to build your army.

To send your army into attack, click the sword icon on the right or press the E key. Your goal is to first destroy the opponent‚Äôs towers and then their castle.

But be careful, as the opponent aims to do the same to your castle.

Controls:

WASD / arrow keys / drag left-click = move
Left-click = interact with the in-game buttons

hits.title: Sudoku
hits.description:
The playing field is a grid with 9x9 cells, divided into smaller grids with a side of 3 cells. Thus, the entire playing field consists of 81 cells. At the beginning of the game, there are already some numbers in them (from 1 to 9). The player is required to fill in the free cells with numbers from 1 to 9 so that in each row, in each column and in each small 3 √ó3 square, each digit would occur only once.
There are multiple levels of difficulty you can choose. Beware of mistakes you can make.
hits.howToPlayText: Click on the cell you want to fill and then click on a number you want there. You can click on the "Notes" button to mark possible numbers without placing them.

hits.title: Cosmic Dash
hits.description: Cosmic Dash is an endless space runner where you pilot your way across the solar system, dodging space junk, collecting tokens, and smashing asteroids. The core loop is simple‚Äîtravel as far as you can while managing jumps, shrinks, and speed boosts‚Äîbut what makes it stand out is its layered mechanics: shrinking lets you slip through debris, boosts let you destroy asteroids, and big tokens chain into massive rewards. The mix of fast reflex gameplay, mission objectives, and planetary backdrops gives it a fresh twist on the classic runner genre.
hits.howToPlayText:
üéÆ How to Play Cosmic Dash

Your mission is to dash through space, travel as far as possible, and collect tokens while avoiding or destroying obstacles.

Controls (Keyboard):

Jump ‚Äì Press UP arrow

Shrink ‚Äì Press DOWN arrow to squeeze through tight gaps and space junk

Move ‚Äì Use LEFT / RIGHT arrows to change position

Boost ‚Äì Press SPACE to speed up and smash through asteroids

Controls (Touch / Mobile):

Jump ‚Äì Swipe UP

Shrink ‚Äì Swipe DOWN

Move ‚Äì Swipe LEFT / RIGHT

Boost ‚Äì Tap the screen


ü™ê Tips & Mechanics:

Collect small tokens to increase your score.

Grab BIG TOKENS to automatically pull in smaller ones.

Use SHRINK to slip past dangerous space junk.

Use BOOST to destroy glowing asteroids and clear the way.

The further you travel, the more challenging and rewarding the journey becomes.

Your quiet farmland is swarmed by strange and dangerous creatures, and only your guns and quick reflexes can keep them away from your crops. Blast through incoming enemies and pick up temporary power-ups along the way ‚Äî rapid-fire shots, explosive ammo, health refills, or extra energy for your electric fence.

Survive enough waves and the stage ends, giving you a choice of random upgrades: unlock new weapons, call in a crop duster airstrike, slow down enemy hordes, attract power-ups with a magnet, and more. As you advance, new heroes with unique styles and abilities become available.

hits.title: Billiards 3D: Russian Pyramid
hits.description: Play a realistic online billiards game against virtual opponents of varying difficulty. Customize AI skill levels to match your ability and improve your game. Enjoy lifelike tables of different sizes and refine your strategy in this immersive billiards experience!
hits.howToPlayText:
- For aiming click anywhere on the table and rotate the cue
- For precise aiming, turn the precision aim wheel on the right side of the screen, or aim the cue while holding down the Shift button if you play on PC
- To hit, click on the cue on the left side of the screen and pull towards the desired force of the blow, then release
- For screws, click on the ball icon with a dot in the upper right part of the screen, move the impact point and confirm the installation of the point by clicking on the green button. If you're playing on a PC, you can hold down the X button on your keyboard while aiming to move the point of impact
- To change the inclination of the cue, click on the cue ball icon at the top of the screen. In this mode, tap anywhere on the screen and raise the cue to the desired angle, then confirm the change by pressing the green button. If you play on a computer, you can hold down the Z button while aiming, this will also change the tilt of the cue.

hits.title: Leap and Avoid 2
hits.description:
The new legendary adventure of the white ball!

This time there are even more caves and even more laboratory levels. New mechanics, great sound and a nice visual design are all in the new "Leap and Avoid 2" game!

The innovation is coins and secret passages. There are secret paths leading to coins all over the world. Collect coins to get nice bonuses in the form of an acceleration of the ball and shield for one touch with hazards!

The more coins you collect, the higher your place in the leaderboard will be. Compete with your friends and find all the hidden coins!
hits.howToPlayText:
The new legendary adventure of the white ball!

This time there are even more caves and even more laboratory levels. New mechanics, great sound and a nice visual design are all in the new "Leap and Avoid 2" game!

The innovation is coins and secret passages. There are secret paths leading to coins all over the world. Collect coins to get nice bonuses in the form of an acceleration of the ball and shield for one touch with hazards!

The more coins you collect, the higher your place in the leaderboard will be. Compete with your friends and find all the hidden coins!

How to play:
Your goal is to get through all hazards in your way to escape!
To do this, move to the right, jumping on white platforms and dodging black platforms. Sometimes you will need to move to the left to jump to the exit or to the hidden paths.

Desktop controls:
‚îÄ Arrows (‚Üê) (‚Üí) left and right or "A" and "D" ‚îÄ ball movement;
‚îÄ "R" button ‚îÄ restart;
‚îÄ "ESC" button ‚îÄ toggle pause;
‚îÄ "LEFT MOUSE BUTTON" ‚îÄ control buttons in the menu.

Mobile controls:
‚îÄ Tap the right and left half of the screen to move the ball;
‚îÄ Tap the buttons in the menu to press them.

hits.title: Planet 404. Episode 1
hits.description:
In this exciting puzzle platformer players embark on an amazing journey with Alice, a brave and curious explorer who finds herself stranded on a mysterious planet filled with secrets. Surrounded by enigmatic landscapes, this world is filled with puzzles that must be solved to uncover its mysteries.

 Each solution and obstacle overcome not only propels the player forward, but also reveals new chapters of Alice's adventure. The game's graphics are designed in a vibrant and colorful style, and the musical accompaniment creates an atmosphere of magic and mystery, immersing the player in an exciting world full of wonders and surprises.
hits.howToPlayText:
On a computer:
To make the character run to the right, press the D button (or the right arrow) on the keyboard.
To make the character run to the left, press the A button (or the left arrow).
To jump, press the space bar (or the up arrow).

On a smartphone or tablet:
To make the character run to the right, tap the right arrow at the bottom of the screen.
To make the character run to the left, tap the left arrow.
To jump, tap the up arrow.
To fire a shot (which becomes available at a certain level), press the fire icon button.

hits.title: Tower Tap
hits.description:
Where every tap brings you closer to victory! In this fun and addictive puzzle game, your mission is to clear layers of colorful cubes to reach the treasure chest at the bottom. The fewer taps you use, the bigger the reward!
Each tower is made up of layers filled with cubes of different colors. When you tap a cube, all connected blocks of the same color pop and disappear. But be careful! You'll need to think ahead to plan your moves and clear the tower efficiently. Every tap counts!
hits.howToPlayText:
Tap Same-Colored Cubes ‚Äì Touch groups of cubes with the same color to break them. The more cubes in a group, the better.
Clear Tower Layers ‚Äì Keep popping cubes to go down each layer of the tower.
Reach the Treasure Chest ‚Äì Your goal is to open the chest at the bottom by clearing all the layers above it.

hits.howToPlayText:
The game "Tile Farm Story" is an exciting and challenging adventure that you won't be able to put down!

The goal of the game is to find identical chips on the field and collect them. The collected chips are collected in the cells below. When there are 3 identical chips in the cells, they will be destroyed. If all the cells are filled, the game will fail.

To win, you must destroy all the chips on the playing field.

Control: touch/click.

hits.title: Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon
hits.description: Embark on a journey to build your own empire in Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon, an engaging online economic simulator that combines elements of resource crafting, empire development, and clicker gameplay. As the ruler of a thriving island, your mission is to explore every corner, uncover precious resources, and craft them into valuable goods. By hiring managers and traders, you can automate tasks and maximize profits, ensuring your empire's success both on the phone and on the computer. Upgrade your factories, fulfill production orders, and let your empire shine in this captivating free game.
hits.howToPlayText:
Idle Crafting Empire Tycoon is an economic simulator, time-killer, combining elements of empire development, resource crafting, and clicker gameplay. You play as a ruler tasked to explore the island, sending expeditions to discover new resources and crafting them. Hire managers and traders to handle the daily tasks and bring additional profits to your empire. Upgrade factories with resources and maintain a balance of production for finished goods. Fulfill production orders and earn valuable rewards.

Explore the island and uncover all the resources needed to make your empire so great that everyone in this fantastic world will know about it!



‚Ä¢ Go through the introductory training, which will explain how the production of goods works, how new regions of the island are opened, and how the process of exploring and discovering new resources works.
‚Ä¢ To earn money, produce resources at factories. After production is completed, the finished product can be sold. Improve factories, produce more goods, and earn more profit.
‚Ä¢ You need to equip and send expeditions (invest the necessary resources and goods) to open up new regions of the island.
‚Ä¢ To discover new resources, go to the research center and purchase the explored resources.
‚Ä¢ To obtain additional profit or automate some actions (such as selling finished products), hire managers and traders

hits.title: Geometry Vibes
hits.description: Geometry Vibes is a reaction-based arcade game where you avoid obstacles, traps and spikes that come at you in waves. Your goal in the game is to keep your arrow on the route and take it as far as possible. Geometry Vibes, where the excitement never ends, invites you to challenge.
hits.howToPlayText:
How to Play Geometry Vibes?

The game is quite simple to play, but difficult to master.
Try to continue without hitting obstacles.

Click to "MOUSE LEFT-CLICK" or "UP ARROW" and hold to fly up.

hits.title: Nuts Bolts Sort
hits.description:
Looking for a game that is both challenging and relaxing? Look no further than "Nuts And Bolts Sort" - the ultimate brain training challenge that doubles as a stress-relieving escape.

The objective of this game is to sort bolts and nuts by type. While the gameplay mechanics are simple, the difficulty increases as you progress through the levels, and you'll need to rely on your brainpower to remember which bolts and nuts belong together.

With beautiful graphics, soothing sound effects, and ASMR elements, "Nuts And Bolts Sort" will keep you engaged and relaxed for hours. And if you're looking for a way to unwind after a stressful day, this game is the perfect way to do it.
hits.howToPlayText:

hits.title: Mini Golf Battle
hits.description:
Mini Golf Battle is a fun and casual mini golf challenge where your goal is simple: hit the ball into the hole with as few shots as possible. The game combines easy controls with tricky levels full of slopes, angles, and obstacles that test your timing and precision.
Each level is designed to get a little harder, so you‚Äôll need to aim carefully, control your shot power, and plan the best path to sink the ball. It‚Äôs a relaxing yet addictive golf experience made for quick play sessions.
hits.howToPlayText:
Drag/swipe in the direction you want the ball to move.
Pull back and release to adjust the strength of your shot.
The longer you drag, the stronger the hit.
Try to sink the ball into the hole in the fewest strokes possible.
Watch out for walls, ramps, and barriers that can deflect your ball.
Use angles to bounce around corners smartly.

Fire Power:
This bonus gives your ball a flaming speed boost.
It‚Äôs useful for long straight shots or when you want to quickly cross a large gap.
Best used when you need maximum distance in a single strike.

Wing / Glide Power:
This bonus allows your ball to glide smoothly as if it has wings.
It reduces friction and gives your ball a longer travel path with better control.
Ideal for precision shots where you want distance but also don‚Äôt want to overshoot too wildly.

Spring / Bounce Power:
This bonus acts like a spring-loaded push.
It helps your ball bounce forward with extra force, perfect for overcoming obstacles or making tricky jumps.
Best for courses with barriers, ramps, or platforms where normal shots can‚Äôt reach.

hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to arrange all the cards into four piles according to suit: from Ace to King. Start with aces, then twos, threes, and so on until you reach the king.

On the game board, you can move cards between seven piles. You can only start a new pile with a king. You can place a card of a different color and one unit of lower value on a card in the stack. Groups of cards with alternating colors and ranks can be dragged between stacks, adding tactical depth.

You can review the deck an unlimited number of times, giving you the opportunity to carefully consider each move. The game ends when all the cards are neatly placed in piles.

Test your skills in this exciting solitaire card game and enjoy every victory!

hits.howToPlayText:
The goal of the game is to collect as large a cube as possible.
Throw a cube on the rest to collect the big ones in the genre of 2048.
I.e. if you throw a cube with a face value of 2 on a cube with a face value of 2, then 2 of them will get a cube of 4. I.e. the face value doubles. Nothing happens with cubes with different denominations, so they begin to accumulate and overflow the container, which complicates the game and can lead to a loss. There are also boosters that allow you to sort out a bunch of unassembled cubes, but you need to earn them by trying to collect several cubes at a time.

hits.title: Animal Merge
hits.description:
Objective: Merge animal bubbles to create upgraded animals and ultimately achieve the final objective by collecting fully developed animals.
Gameplay Instructions:
Launching the Animal Bubbles:
Tap on an animal bubble to select it.
Drag the bubble backward to aim.
Release to launch the bubble in the opposite direction.
Merging Animal Bubbles:
When two identical animal bubbles collide, they merge to create an upgraded version.
Continue merging bubbles of the same type to progress.
Achieving the Objective:
Merge two basic-level animal bubbles to form an intermediate-level animal.
Merge intermediate-level animal bubbles to create the final full-fledged animal.
Once the final animal is created, it is automatically collected as part of the level objective.
Winning the Level:
The level is completed when you have successfully created and collected the required number of final animals.

hits.title: Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive
hits.description: Experience the excitement of Monster Slayer: Merge & Survive, a dynamic game where you merge items to craft powerful tools and potions. Test your strategy as you navigate dungeons. Play for free online on both mobile and desktop. Embrace your heroic side!
hits.howToPlayText:
Welcome to our thrilling adventure game! Your journey consists of two main parts: merging items and exploring dungeons.

Merging Items 
In the lower part of the screen, you will find the merging grid. This is where you combine different items to gain various effects:
- Weapons: Merge different weapon parts to create powerful weapons that deal damage to enemies.
- Potions: Combine potions to restore health and boost your survivability.
- Keys: Merge keys to unlock chests scattered throughout the dungeon, which contain valuable loot.
- Coin Pouches: Collect and merge coin pouches to purchase new items from the shop and expand your inventory by buying travel bags from the merchant.

Dungeon Exploration 
In the upper part of the screen, your character moves through the dungeon level by level. Use the items you've merged to overcome challenges and defeat enemies as you delve deeper into the dungeon. 

Embark on this epic journey, combine powerful items, and conquer the depths of the dungeon!

hits.howToPlayText:

hits.title: StickerBall
hits.description:
Stickerball is a fast-paced game where you collect stickers using a ball with unique abilities! Your goal is to collect 180 colorful stickers across 9 levels by completing challenges and activating triggers that change the game‚Äôs rules. Each turn, 10 stickers fly onto the field from a purchased pack, but any uncollected ones disappear‚Äîact quickly and precisely!

The game shines with 14 dynamic triggers: freeze stickers, double rewards with "x2," turn the ball into a magnet or ghost, activate "disco" mode, or control a dual ball! The more stickers you collect in one turn, the higher your combo and the more coins you earn. Holo-stickers, with their unique designs, grant double the currency!

Play across 12 vibrant, randomly changing fields. Buy sticker packs, upgrade your collection, and strategize by activating triggers at the perfect moment to maximize rewards.
hits.howToPlayText:
How to play:
1. Aiming:
Move your cursor to aim-the arrow on the ball shows the strike direction.

2. Power Charging:
Hold LMB to fill the arrow‚Äôs power gauge. Release to launch the ball! Striking too early cancels the shot.

3. Collecting Stickers:
After striking, the ball bounces off walls, collecting stickers, coins, and crystals. The more you gather in one turn, the higher your combo and bonuses!

4. Triggers:
Collect special icons (magnet, x2, freeze, etc.) to power up the ball or alter sticker behavior. For example, "Ghost" lets the ball pass through triggers, while "Double Move" grants a second strike without new stickers appearing.

5. Buying Packs:
Before your first turn, choose a free Level 1 pack. Each pack contains 100 stickers, with 10 appearing per turn.

6. Strategy Tips:
Use "Freeze" or "Bonus" to increase the number of stickers on the field.
Combine triggers like "Magnet" + "x2" for double rewards.
Prioritize Holo-stickers - they grant x2 coins!

hits.title: Roots and Wheels
hits.description:
This exciting simulator presents you with an ambitious task: get behind the wheel of a powerful truck and transport as many crates as possible through dangerous and unpredictable locations to your destination.


Success depends on your skill‚Äîyour ability to feel the vehicle and react to road conditions‚Äîand your wits‚Äîyour ability to find the best solutions in difficult situations, whether it's mud, steep climbs, or destroyed bridges. Every box delivered brings you closer to your reward.


By earning money for completed trips, you get the opportunity to upgrade your truck ‚Äì from the engine to the suspension to the wheels ‚Äì and better equip it for the challenges of the terrain.


You can also buy new vehicle models, expanding your options and gaining access to new types of missions and cargo. Show what a real driver can do!

hits.howToPlayText:

Your task is to drive through complex tracks and bring to the finish line as many boxes as possible, using your agility to maneuver and wit to find the best solutions in difficult situations off-road.

The controls are intuitive, whether you're playing on your phone or computer. On mobile devices you control the movement with touch pedals: right - forward, left - backward. On the computer you use the keys: D for forward and A for backward.

Earn money. Invest it in improvements for your machines. Or save up to buy new cars - each with its own unique capabilities, ready for the most extreme tests. Expand your fleet, improve your skills and become the best off-road driver!

hits.howToPlayText:
Get ready for the adventure in "Raised Knight," the endless runner where your skills will be put to the test!
Run through a world full of obstacles while trying to cover as much distance as possible. Every move counts, so make sure you master the controls!

[A] / [D] ‚Üí Move:
Use [A] and [D] to move left or right. Dodge obstacles, take advantage of openings, and be prepared for any challenge that comes your way. Your agility is key!

[Space] ‚Üí Jump / Float:
Hold down the [Space] key to jump or float. Jump over obstacles or float in the air to avoid dangers that cross your path. Air control can be the difference between success and failure!

[Ctrl] ‚Üí Slide:
Use [Ctrl] to slide under obstacles and save yourself from critical situations. Slide quickly to pass under low obstacles and keep advancing without missing a beat.

hits.description:

In this relaxing and addictive puzzle game, you have to search for identical objects and carefully place them on the shelves. Arrange things so that three identical items are next to each other ‚Äî they will combine into a triplet and make room for new finds.

Collect objects three at a time, decorating your virtual corner and turning it into an ideal space for relaxing the soul. Cleaning has never been so much fun!

This light and peaceful game is suitable for everyone ‚Äî regardless of age, gender and experience. If you love order, beautiful collections and a pleasant atmosphere ‚Äî this game is just for you!
hits.howToPlayText:
Just drag and drop the items and place them neatly on the shelves. Collect three identical objects on the same shelf to create a triplet and make room for new items.

Complete the levels, clearing all the shelves and revealing your strategic wit. With each new stage, the difficulty increases, and with it the pleasure of solving problems!

Unlock dozens of unique items. The more levels you complete, the more cool rewards you'll get!

Simple, intuitive and incredibly addictive gameplay awaits you. Are you ready to start cleaning up?

hits.title: Vikings
hits.description: Battle with 8-card heroes in this epic online game! Unlock Warriors, Berserkers, Hunters & Shamans. Level up cards, collect gear, earn silver & energy, and grow your hero by completing raids and daily quests. Start your adventure now!
hits.howToPlayText: All heroes have 8 cards in the battle. There are 4 types of cards: Warriors, Berserkers, Hunters and Shamans. Simple cards (warriors) attack only with swords. To unlock the ability to attack with other cubes, it is necessary to increase the number of stars on the map, and chests will help in this. Also, as the stars increase, the damage it causes increases. The level of the card cannot be higher than the level of the hero, to increase the level of the card, you need the appropriate experience banks. All banks can be used only for simple cards. By putting on a thing, you increase the health of your hero. By wearing all 6 items, you can increase the hero's rank, which will also add health. If you don't have enough silver, use the wheel (by clicking on the silver from above), you can also find silver in the maze. You can gain experience for the hero level by completing daily tasks and winning raids. In the vastness of the game, you can get cans of energy to use them - click on the energy icon.

Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey: A Feline Hero‚Äôs Adventure Begins!

Join a brave cat on an epic quest in Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey, a fresh twist on the classic balls-and-cups game. This isn't just about tossing balls into cups‚Äîit's a full-blown adventure packed with clever puzzles, physics-based challenges, and one courageous kitty determined to save the day.

Your Cat, the Hero
Meet your furry champion‚Äîa quick-thinking, nimble cat with a heart of gold. As danger looms and traps lie in wait, it‚Äôs up to this whiskered warrior to take on wild levels filled with spinning platforms, explosives, and tricky obstacles.

Precision Meets Puzzle
Each level is a test of aim and timing. Launch the ball just right, bounce it off the environment, and land it perfectly in the cup. It‚Äôs not just about power‚Äîsuccess requires strategy, finesse, and a little creative thinking.
 What Awaits You
- Over 200 unique levels, ranging from simple to seriously tricky
- Skill-based gameplay that mixes timing, puzzle-solving, and action
- Hero upgrades: unlock new feline champions and grow stronger as you progress
- Satisfying animations and smooth physics that make every throw feel great
- Enemies and traps: it's not just puzzles‚Äîyou‚Äôll have to outsmart swarm enemies too

Become a Cup Champion
Explore a magical world where every level brings new challenges. Battle your way through enemy swarms, master the art of the perfect shot, and rise as the legendary hero of the cup realm.

Cup Quest ‚Äì Hero‚Äôs Journey isn‚Äôt just a puzzle game‚Äîit‚Äôs a heartwarming, skill-testing adventure that‚Äôll keep you coming back for more. Grab your paws, line up your shot, and get ready to become a legend.

hits.title: Emoji Sort
hits.description: Emoji Sort is a pattern recognition puzzle game where players must fill in empty cells with the correct emojis. Each puzzle presents a grid with missing emojis that follow specific patterns - such as categories, sequences, or associations. Players analyze the existing emojis to identify the pattern (animals, food chains, transportation types, etc.) and select the appropriate emojis to complete the grid. The game features 30 increasingly challenging levels with various pattern types, and includes a hint system to help when players get stuck. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts who enjoy discovering logical connections between visual elements!
hits.howToPlayText:
Select the appropriate emoji by clicking or touching it.
Each puzzle may seem nonsensical, but there is only one correct answer!

Right: the D key or the right arrow.
You can use the left or right mouse button to perform a kick.

hits.title: The Depth of the Limbo
hits.description:
The game is about a girl in limbo who has to complete all the levels to wake up. Top view: The character must overcome 13 levels. Each level is a one‚Äîminute test cycle, but the camera rotates around the hero, changing the orientation of the space. Due to the moving camera, you can get confused about right, left, up and down, which turns simple routes into a puzzle.

The lines of the path seem familiar until they turn around your head, forcing you to rethink each goal. The goal is simple and touching: to complete the route from beginning to end, overcome the inner noise of fear, and wake up refreshed and free.
hits.howToPlayText:
On the computer:
To make the character move to the right, left, up or down, press the D, A, W, S keys or the arrows to the right, left, up or down, respectively.

hits.title: Run The Electricity
hits.description:
Run The Electricity is a unique puzzle game that combines simplicity and benefits for your mind. It is designed to give relaxation, help to cope with stress and improve concentration.

Instead of intense gameplay and a race against time, a calm process awaits you here: you just need to connect lines, lamps and energy sources in a closed circuit to turn on the light.

Minimalistic design, smooth animation and soothing music create an atmosphere of complete tranquility comparable to yoga. This is not just a game, but a means to meditate and combat anxiety. You can play it at home, on the road, or at work to distract yourself and restore your mental balance.

Smart puzzles train logic and imagination, and simple mechanics allow you to have fun from the first seconds. Discover a world of light, harmony and tranquility!
hits.howToPlayText:
Playing this game is easy and enjoyable. All you need to do is tap on the lines and turn them until you get a closed electrical circuit.

For the light to come on, at least one lamp and a wire must be connected in it. As soon as this happens, the lines will shine, and you will get a feeling of completeness and tranquility.

Each puzzle takes only a few seconds, but it brings a lot of fun. This makes the game ideal for short pauses, trips, or waiting. You don't have to rush: the levels are unlimited in time, and you can solve them at your own pace.

With each new stage, the tasks become more interesting and diverse, training concentration and attention. Conduct Electricity will help to cope with anxiety, give positive emotions and become an excellent anti-stress remedy. Just open the game, start connecting the lines, and feel your mind calm down.

hits.title: Bubble Tower
hits.description:
Bubble Tower 3D is a relaxing 3D bubble-pop / color-match puzzle game.
You rotate a tower (or cylinder) loaded with colored bubbles around its vertical axis.
Your goal is to shoot bubbles, matching colors to connect groups of the same color. When matched, those bubbles pop/drop off the tower.
There are many levels; difficulty increases as you go. More bubble colors, trickier arrangements, limited shots, etc.
Also there are diamonds or special gems you can collect in certain levels. These may unlock ‚Äúshiny shapes‚Äù or cosmetic things.
The graphics are clean, simple, and meant for relaxing casual play. It mixes mental challenge (where to shoot, color matching) with a soothing visual.
hits.howToPlayText:
A tower appears with a cluster of bubbles of various colors. There‚Äôs a shooter that holds the next bubble to fire.
You can rotate the tower around (usually by dragging left/right or using onscreen controls) to bring bubbles of matching color in position.
Tap or drag to aim, then let go (or tap a location) to shoot the bubble toward the tower. Match it with other bubbles of the same color.
When you connect 3 or more bubbles of the same color, those bubbles pop/drop off. Bubbles that are hanging (i.e. no longer connected to the base or other bubbles) also fall off.
Some levels include diamonds or special gems placed in certain parts of the bubble structure. You need to target those, maybe by matching bubbles around them or popping surrounding bubbles to let them fall.
You win a level if all bubbles (or the required ones) are cleared. If you run out of shots (or fail to clear the required bubbles), you lose and must retry.

hits.title: Connect Line
hits.description:
Connect Lines is a puzzle game in which the goal is to rotate line-segments so that together they form a continuous connected path or network i.e. all the lines must join up into one single connected structure.
It is simple in appearance but grows challenging, because you must figure out the correct orientation of each piece so that the network is complete without any breaks.
As the puzzle advances, the arrangement / layout becomes more complex. The number of line-pieces increases, the shapes become more varied, and finding the correct connection scheme becomes harder. You may need to think ahead about how rotating one piece will affect connections with several adjacent pieces. (This is standard for these kinds of puzzles.)
hits.howToPlayText:
Connect all lines into one unified path (or network). Every piece must be connected properly so there are no loose ends.
The board has many small line segments. These might be straight lines, curves, etc. Each segment is oriented in some way.
You can click on a line piece to rotate it. Each click usually rotates the piece by 90¬∞ (or possibly another fixed amount) to change its orientation.

hits.description: In Spill It!, you drop balls in order to knock over glasses and spill everything inside them. It combines simple mechanics with physics-based puzzles‚Äîto achieve the goal you must carefully aim, drop, and use gravity / momentum to spill from glasses.
hits.howToPlayText:
You get to drop balls from certain positions.
You can aim or choose the drop point in many cases.
The balls interact with the environment: glassware, supports, possibly moving platforms or obstacles.
Physics matters: timing, angle, force, obstacle clearance.

Your goal is to spill all the liquid from the glasses. You do this by using the balls: drop, throw or position them so that they hit the glasses (directly or via bouncing or rollovers) and cause the liquid inside to spill out.

hits.title: Rotate Cups
hits.description:
This is a rotation physics puzzle game where you control the angle of cups to try to get the balls to roll into specific cups.
Rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise as needed to turn the clear cups into ramps guiding the ball down the level.
Place at least one ball in each of the blue cups.
In this game you have to get all the balls into the blue cups lower down the screen.
Larger blue cups can hold more than one ball in them.
If there are multiple smaller blue cups you must get a ball into each of them.
Levels are not timed & you can both rotate as many times as you like & pause as many times as you like.

You can skip intermediary cups. On most levels you typically want to use all the cups on the way down, but if you are struggling to do so you can bump a ball off the outside of a cup or skip a cup entirely & it won‚Äôt harm you in the least provided your balls eventually get into the blue cups.
Some levels have a long reach you have to make the ball roll. On those levels sometimes a somewhat rapid cup spin toward the destination is enough, but in some cases you have to do that rapid spin as the starting point & then slightly spin back quickly right as the ball is leaving to give the ball a bit more lift.
hits.howToPlayText:
Desktop:
Use your mouse left click button to select on the screen & drag your mouse to rotate the cups.
Drag left or down to spin clockwise.
Drag right or up to spin counterclockwise.

Touchscreen devices:
Tap the screen with a finger & drag your finger across the screen to rotate cups clockwise or counterclockwise.

hits.title: Screw Puzzle
hits.description:
Embark on a captivating journey into the world of Wood Screw Puzzle, the ultimate wood nuts and bolts puzzle game that will challenge your mind and delight your senses. This isn't just another screw sort game; it's an immersive experience where you'll unravel intricate arrangements of wood screws, nuts and bolts, and other fascinating fasteners, proving your screw master skills along the way.

Unscrew, Unwind, and Unleash Your Inner Puzzle Master:

Each level of Wood Screw Puzzle presents a unique challenge, a mesmerizing tapestry of wood screws and nuts and bolts intertwined in a complex dance. Your task is to carefully analyze the arrangement, strategize your moves, and skillfully manipulate the screw pins and fasteners to screw out each piece and free them from their wooden embrace. It's a test of your logic, spatial reasoning, and dexterity, all wrapped up in a visually stunning and tactilely satisfying wood nuts and bolts puzzle game.
hits.howToPlayText:
Solve the Wooden Puzzle: Conquer the challenge of the wooden stack, untangle bolts and nuts, and unlock the secrets hidden deep within the wood.
Master the Mechanic Puzzle: Arm yourself with a screwdriver and outsmart wood wasps, overcome the plumer crack obstacles, and avoid the whimsical squirrel nuts.
Explore the Woods: Venture into the heart of the woods game, where each level brings a new conundrum. Are you ready to delve into the mind-blowing world of Screws & Fasteners?

hits.title: Number Sums
hits.description:
Number Sums is a challenging number puzzle to train your mental math. The goal is to make the sum of numbers in each row, column, and colored region be equal to the clues on the side of the board and inside the colored regions. Practice your math skills and logic with Number Sums!

Each row, column, and region has its own solution, but the goal of this math game with numbers is to make them all work at the same time. You have to circle the correct numbers and erase the numbers you don't need. Remember, the sums of the numbers in rows, columns and colored regions should be equal to the numbers on the sides of the board and inside each region. Each level of this numbers game has only one solution, try to find it to solve educational math puzzles!

Mental arithmetic is an invaluable math skill for your everyday life. Inside Number Sums you'll find math puzzles of various difficulty. The mechanics of these math riddles sounds simple but requires a lot of thinking. Playing sum number games and solving math problems can improve your arithmetic skills. If you are interested in number puzzles or math games for adults, and in training your addition skills, play this engaging number game for hours of fun!
hits.howToPlayText:
- Circle the correct numbers that add up to the values on the sides of the rows, columns and regions.
- Use the toggle to switch between circling and erasing modes. It will help you to mark the correct numbers and the extra numbers that you don't need.
- Each level of these math puzzles has only one possible solution, so make sure that the rows, columns and colored regions work together at the same time.
- Train your math skills with this free number puzzle with various levels of difficulty. Open different types of board from 3x3 to 10x10.

hits.title: Laser Survivor
hits.description:
Laser Survivor, a cyberpunk roguelike action-adventure set in a neon-drenched post-apocalypse, the last hope for humanity rests in the hands of five heroes fighting hordes of demons pouring through a dimensional rift. Featuring pixel art visuals, randomized weapons, chiptune soundtracks, and relentless survival gameplay, every run is a test of adaptation and skill.

Story
The world has fallen. A dimensional rift has unleashed an unstoppable flood of demons, tearing through what remains of civilization. But from the chaos, five warriors rise. Each wielding unique powers forged for survival in this cyberpunk hellscape. Dropped at random into corrupted maps, they must adapt with whatever weapons and passive abilities they find, carving their path through waves of enemies, unlocking upgrades, and uncovering the truth behind the rift. The fate of Earth depends on them.

Heroes
Blaze: Fires homing bullets that lock onto the nearest enemy, ensuring no demon can escape.
Neon: Projects a protective energy shield that damages anything foolish enough to get close.
Hunter: Drops explosives that create deadly zones, controlling the battlefield with traps.
Slash: Slices enemies apart with razor-sharp horizontal cuts that pierce entire hordes.
Jaxx: A cyber-brute with massive, scaling area damage, crushing everything in his path.


Features
Cyberpunk Roguelike Gameplay: Every run is unique, with randomized spawn points, weapons, and abilities.
5 Maps to Conquer: Battle through the Lab, Forest, Crypt, Factory, and Dungeon, each swarming with demon hordes.
10 Active Weapons & 10 Passive Abilities: Build your arsenal on the fly as you adapt to randomized loadouts.
8 Missions & 11 Upgrades: Progress through challenging missions, earn permanent upgrades, and unlock new survival tactics.
Collectibles & Lore: Discover secrets that reveal the origins of the rift and the story behind the invasion.
Retro Pixel Art: Neon-infused visuals with hand-crafted pixel art and gameplay by the Felicity team.
80s Chiptune Soundtrack: Pulsating tracker music by Drozerix, driving the action with nostalgic energy.

Why Play Laser Survivor?
Fast-paced roguelike survival set in a sci-fi cyberpunk apocalypse.
Play as five unique heroes, each with distinct base abilities and upgrade paths.
Endless replayability with randomized runs and evolving builds.
Perfect for fans of pixel art shooters, bullet-hell roguelikes, and retro-inspired chiptune soundtracks.

Laser Survivor is more than survival. It‚Äôs humanity‚Äôs last stand in a cyberpunk post-apocalypse. Will you master the chaos, close the rift, and save the world... or be consumed by the demons?
hits.howToPlayText: Arrow keys, or WASD for movement of the characters with keyboard, or Mouse. Touch controls on Mobile for movement of the characters.

hits.title: Color Roll 3D
hits.description:
Experience one of the most addictive, color-filled puzzle game ‚Äî Color Roll 3D! Think you've got a keen eye for details? Ready to challenge your brain? Then this color game is just for you! It's all about color, creativity, and some serious agility!

In Color Roll 3D, you'll need to copy the exact image you're shown, down to the last detail! How? Just by unrolling and arranging the vibrantly colored rolls the puzzle game give you for each level. Sounds easy, right? But wait, there's a catch! You've got to ensure the colors overlap in just the right way to perfectly match the image.

Got the image in your head? Great! Now get to work and let those colorful rolls fly! Just tap each roll and watch as it smoothly moves across your screen, bringing the image to life. But remember, it's all about getting those colors to line up just right!
hits.howToPlayText:
You are given several colored rolls. Each roll is like a ribbon or band that you can tap to start unrolling.
When you tap, the roll moves/unrolls and overlays onto the puzzle area. The goal is that the overlapping colours and their positions match the sample image you‚Äôre trying to replicate.
The challenge comes from getting the direction and position of each roll correct. If you unroll a roll the wrong way, or overlay in the wrong spot, the final image will look different from the target.

hits.description: Ball Bounce is a casual game that is very fun and challenging. Your task is to guide the ball which continues to bounce towards the portal while passing through obstacles
hits.howToPlayText:
Ball Bounce is a casual game that is very fun and challenging. Your task is to guide the ball which continues to bounce towards the portal while passing through obstacles.

press Screen right: Move left.

hits.title: Millionaire Life
hits.description: After a rough start, you've hit the jackpot, won the lottery and now go wild! Live out your wildest RICH dreams! Indulge in lavish spending, fulfill your biggest dreams, and embrace a life of over-the-top luxury with no regrets. Live the Millionaire Life! Start from humble beginnings and rise to the extravagant lifestyle of your dreams. Spend big on flashy cars, luxury mansions, and golden accessories as you show the world your fortune. In this fun and over-the-top casual game, your goal is simple: live lavishly, make bold choices, and embrace the most outrageous version of wealth imaginable. Unlock new items, upgrade your lifestyle, and become the ultimate symbol of success!
hits.howToPlayText:
Desktop Controls:

Mouse Click: Interact with buttons, menus, and purchase options.

Drag with Mouse: Move objects, unlock items, and complete tasks.

Mobile Controls:

Tap: Interact with items, buttons, and upgrade options.

Swipe/Drag: Collect, move, or place items to progress.

hits.title: Happy Glass - Draw to Fill
hits.description: Happy Glass: Draw to Fill is a creative and relaxing puzzle game where your goal is to fill a happy glass with water ‚Äî but there's a twist! You must draw lines and shapes to guide the water flow into the glass. Think strategically, draw creatively, and use physics to your advantage as you solve increasingly challenging levels. The game features colorful visuals, satisfying animations, and a joyful glass that smiles only when full. Whether you're a fan of brain teasers or just love doodling your way through clever puzzles, this game is sure to entertain and test your ingenuity.
hits.howToPlayText: Use your finger or mouse to draw lines or shapes on the screen. These drawings will act as paths, ramps, or barriers to guide the water into the glass. The goal is to fill the glass above the dashed line without spilling too much water. Think carefully and use your imagination to solve each level ‚Äî and don‚Äôt forget, the glass only smiles when it‚Äôs full!

hits.title: Fill The Lines
hits.description: Lines to Fill is a thinking game where you draw lines to complete the given puzzle shape. Simply drag one of the colorful blocks using your finger or the left mouse button, and make sure there are no blank spots left. Since the game has no time limits and no way to lose, you can enjoy this stress-free experience complete with hundreds of unique levels on your computer or mobile device. Can you block out some time and finish every level?
hits.howToPlayText:
You see a puzzle ‚Äúshape‚Äù made up of empty (blank) spots.
At the bottom (or somewhere), there are colorful blocks (pieces), each made of line-segments or shapes.
You drag a block using your finger (touch screen) or with mouse (click & drag)
You place it into the puzzle shape so that it fits ‚Äî you want to fill all blank spots, leaving no gaps.
There is no time limit, and there‚Äôs no losing condition ‚Äî you just progress by completing levels.

hits.title: Okay
hits.description:
Okay? is a minimalist puzzle game that turns simple shapes into clever challenges. Every level is made of blocks, lines, and objects placed on a clean, abstract screen. Your goal is simple: clear all the objects with just one perfect move.

Draw a line with your finger, release it, and watch it bounce around the screen. If your move is right, the line will hit and remove every object until the screen is empty. Sounds easy? As levels go up, the puzzles get smarter, requiring perfect angles, timing, and logic.
hits.howToPlayText:
Your goal is to clear all the elements (lines, blocks, etc.) from the board.
You draw a line (with your finger / touch) starting from somewhere, and that line interacts with the elements on screen.
The drawn line will ‚Äúpop‚Äù or hit the elements, making them disappear (‚Äúclear all the elements‚Äù) if done correctly.
There are many levels, increasingly challenging.
Some puzzles are simple; others require more precise dragging, angles, and timing.

hits.title: Unravel Eggs Puzzle
hits.description: Celebrate Easter weekend in style this year with the sweet new puzzle game, Unravel Eggs Puzzle! Complete each level by untangling eggs such that each line connecting eggs is not intersected by any other line connecting eggs. Warm up with some light puzzles and work your way up to an egg-tangling like you've never seen! Happy Easter!
hits.howToPlayText:
Grab an egg:
Touch and drag an egg to move it around the screen.

Reposition to avoid intersections:
Adjust positions so that none of the connecting lines between eggs cross each other. All lines must be ‚Äúuntangled.‚Äù

Change color to green:
When the arrangement has no intersecting lines, the eggs and the lines turn green, meaning the level is solved.

hits.title: TENKYU BALL
hits.description: TENKYU BALL is a 3D casual ball-rolling puzzle game where you must guide a ball through tilting stages to reach the goal. The environment is minimalistic, and the challenge comes from balancing control vs risk. As you tilt the stage more, the ball moves faster, but there‚Äôs danger: if you tilt too much, the ball may fall off and you'll fail the level.
hits.howToPlayText:
Tilt the stage / swipe finger:
You swipe (or drag) on your screen to tilt the surface on which the ball rests.
The tilt direction determines where the ball rolls.
Control carefully:
If you tilt too much, the ball gains speed and can fall off the edge.
Tilt only as much as needed to navigate turns, avoid gaps, and make tricky maneuvers.
Reach the goal:
Each stage has a goal point or exit you must reach. Successfully get the ball there without falling off.
Failure and retry:
If the ball falls, the level ends (you lose) and you‚Äôll need to restart that stage.

hits.title: Telekinetic Pumpkin
hits.description:
Telekinetic Pumpkin is an arcade game where an experiment aimed at creating a magnificent, oversized pumpkin for Halloween takes an unexpected turn, resulting in the creation of a telekinetic pumpkin.


You‚Äôre a Pumpkin that teleports and moves objects with its mind! Destroy drones by smashing them, and collect power-ups to stay alive. Select your upgrades and try to survive as long as possible.
hits.howToPlayText: Double-click on a location to teleport. Click and drag anything to move it with your mind (boxes, enemies, or power-ups). Every 35 seconds, you can select a random upgrade or ability to help you survive longer.

hits.title: Toytopia
hits.description: Toytopia is a cozy merge game where you are tasked to combine and produce art materials which you can use to fix broken toys. Each toy presents a unique challenge and difficulty.
hits.howToPlayText: In Toytopia, you simply need to fix the broken parts of a toy by merging art items to produce the required art materials. Use the mouse cursor (desktop) or finger (mobile) to drag and drop items on the board.

hits.description: Screw Match - Nuts and Bolts. Your task is to put screws of different colors on the glass nut to the box on the top with the same color as the screws. If the nut holes on the box are full, you will be replaced by a new box.
hits.howToPlayText: Put screws of different colors on the glass nut to the box on the top with the same color as the screws
